SA16n1276:13: (u) ghaṭādi kāyikakarmaṇaḥ phalam na kāyikaṃ karma |
SA16n1276:19: (u) idaṃ kṣaṇikavarge pratyuktaṃ yadekasmin dharma utpadyamāne'nyasyāpacaya upacayo vā [tat] kāyikaṃ karmeti |
SA16n1276:20: (pṛ) tathā cet kāya eva kāyikaṃ karma bhavet |
SA16n1276:22: na tu kāyena kṛtaṃ kāyikaṃ karma |
SA16n1276:33: atastatsamudayo yadi vā kuśalo [yadi vā] akuśalaḥ na tu sākṣātkāyikaḥ |
SA16n1276:36: cittabalāt śabdavyavahārasamuditaṃ karma kuśalamakuśalaṃ vācikaṃ karmetyucyate |
SA16n1276:38: ya imaṃ sattvaṃ hanmīti adhyavasitacitto bhavati |
SA16n1276:43: (u) tat dvidhā bhavati mana eva mānasaṃ karma manasa utpannaṃ vā mānasaṃ karma iti |
SA16n1276:44: sattvaṃ hanmīti yadadhyavasitaṃ manaḥ tadakuśalaṃ mana eva manasaṃ karma |
SA16n1276:55: nahyasti tatra kāraṇaṃ kevalaṃ kāyikavācikāvijñaptirevāsti na mānasikāvijñaptiriti |
SA16n1276:56: sūtre coktaṃ dvidhā karma-cetanā vā cetayitvā vā [karme] ti |
SA16n1276:58: cetayitvā [karma] trividham-cetanāsañcitaṃ karma kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmeti |
SA16n1276:66: (u) cittaṃ pratītyotpadyamānaṃ puṇyapāpaṃ middhamūrchādikāle'pi yannityaṃ pravartate |
SA16n1276:71: teṣāṃ divā ca rātriñca sadā puṇyaṃ pravartate || iti |
SA16n1276:87: uktaṃ hi sūtre-vīryavān puruṣa āyurvaśāt bahupuṇyaṃ prasavati |
SA16n1276:92: āha ca vanādiropasya divā rātriñca sadā puṇyaṃ pravardhata iti |
SA16n1276:95: kathaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt puṇyaṃ sadā pravardhate,
SA16n1276:111: idānīṃ kimidaṃ rūpaṃ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktasaṃskāraḥ |
SA16n1276:117: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ ṣaṭ cetanākāyāḥ saṃskāraskandha iti |
SA16n1276:119: (u) pratipāditamidaṃ pūrvaṃ yadasti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ cittaviprayuktamiti |
SA16n1276:160: yadi yodhājīvo vyavaharasi na tadā gaṇayiṣyāmīti yāvat tridhā pṛcchati |
SA16n1276:161: yadyakaraṇacittapūrvakaṃ karoti-yathā kaścidviharan pādanikṣepaṇena kīṭaṃ hanti |
SA16n1276:171: upacitākṛtamiti-yat anyaṃ hananādi kārayitvā pramuditacitto bhavati |
SA16n1276:172: anyaṃ dānādi kārayitvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati |
SA16n1276:173: kṛtopacitamiti-yat hananādi pāpaṃ kṛtvā dānādipuṇyaṃ kṛtvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati |
SA16n1276:174: akṛtānupacitamiti-na ca karoti nāpi muditacitto bhavati |
SA16n1276:176: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yat karma kṛtamupacitaṃ tasya karmaṇo'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā iti |
SA16n1276:177: ataḥ kṛtopacitakarmaṇo dṛṣṭadharme vā vipāko vedyate |
SA16n1276:180: (pṛ) yadi hetukṛtopacitakarmaṇo'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā tadā nāsti vimuktiḥ |
SA16n1276:187: (pṛ) yadi gurupāpakaṃ karma alpamātrakaṃ [dṛṣṭadharma] vedanīyaṃ prajñāyate |
SA16n1276:189: (u) yastattvajñānaṃ na bhāvayati sa pāpakarmaṇo'nuśayaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:205: niyatavipākaṃ karma bahu vā alpaṃ vā avaśyavedanīyavipākam |
SA16n1276:214: yathā bhagavati tacchrāvake vā satkāraḥ athavā'lpamātrānindā |
SA16n1276:225: yathā rājadharme gurupātakī daṇḍya eva na kṣantavyaḥ ||
SA16n1276:240: dharmo dharma iti [yat] tannāstīti tasmin vadati kuśaladharmāṇāmacaritāro bahavaḥ sattvāḥ pratihanyanta ityato bhavati gurutaraṃ pāpam |
SA16n1276:244: nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ nāsti mātāpitṛsajjānānāṃ satkāravipāka iti yadvacanaṃ tadādimithyādṛṣṭirapi tadvipākaprāpiṇī |
SA16n1276:245: anyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭau pātayan bahūn sattvānakuśalāni kārayaṃśca tadvipākaṃ vedayate |
SA16n1276:246: īdṛśamithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇi racayanti yathā pūraṇādayo mithyādṛṣṭināmācāryāḥ samyagdṛṣṭivihiṃsayā bahūnāṃ sattvānāmakuśalāya hetupratyayaṃ prakāśayanti |
SA16n1276:259: guruviparītaṃ laghu yaduta tapanapratapanādiṣu hīnanarakeṣu tīryakṣu preteṣu devamanuṣyeṣu cākuśalavipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate |
SA16n1276:275: evaṃ manuṣyeṣu caturmahārājikānāmadhaḥ pratyekaṃ karmavaśādvipākaṃ vedayate |
SA16n1276:283: tato jaghanyabhūteṣu caturapramāṇacitteṣu viharan śīlasamādhipratyayavaśācca rūpadhātāvutpadyate |
SA16n1276:288: (pṛ) puṇyakṣetraṃ kiṃ bodhyotkṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ vā prahāṇena |
SA16n1276:292: yathā bhagavān bodhyā śrāvakebhyo'tiricyate na prahāṇena |
SA16n1276:297: ato yadbodhisattvānāṃ saṃsāre dīrghakālāvāsaḥ sa samyak prahāṇārthaḥ |
SA16n1276:314: tasminneva sūtra uktaṃ-tiraścāṃ dānaṃ śataguṇaṃ hitaṃ prāpayati iti |
SA16n1276:315: vastutastu pārāvatapakṣyādīnāṃ dānena pratilabdho vipākaḥ tīrthikānāṃ pañcābhijñānāṃ dānamatiśete |
SA16n1276:317: sūtraṃ tat bahunā hetunāha-nissaraṇārthā prajñā iti |
SA16n1276:324: asmin śrāmaṇere utpannānuttara [bodhi] citte tu arhanneva tatpātracīvaramādāya svayamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā tamanugacchati |
SA16n1276:331: (u) yat karma pareṣāṃ priyaṃ prayacchati tat kuśalam |
SA16n1276:336: yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhaprāpakaṃ tena pāpena bhavitavyam |
SA16n1276:337: yathā āñjanauṣadhaśalyavedhāḥ pareṣāṃ duḥkhajanakāḥ pāpāḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1276:340: yathā paradāragamanaṃ tat tasya sukhajanakaṃ tat puṇyakaramapi syāt |
SA16n1276:342: yat parānukuśaladharme pravartayati tat duḥkhāya bhavati na sukhāya |
SA16n1276:347: tadannapānaṃ kadācidajīryamāṇaṃ sat puruṣasya maraṇaṃ prāpayati |
SA16n1276:348: tadannadāyakaḥ kiṃ pāpaṃ labheta kiṃ vā puṇyam |
SA16n1276:353: (u) idaṃ pūrvameva pratyuktaṃ yadabrahmacaryaṃ niyamena akuśalamiti |
SA16n1276:362: yathā corāṇāṃ nigrahe rāṣṭraṃ nirīti bhavati |
SA16n1276:383: iti prāṇātipātāt kathaṃ puṇyaṃ na bhavati |
SA16n1276:389: āha ca ca sūtram-yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti |
SA16n1276:390: yathāha gāthā-mriyamāṇañca saṅgrāme patiṃ barayatepsarāḥ iti | kiñcāha-
SA16n1276:392: hanyādeva na vai pāpaṃ āhantā vindate tu tat || iti
SA16n1276:395: brāhmaṇasya ṣaḍdharmāḥ kṣatriyasya catvāro vaiśyasya trayaḥ śūdrasyaikaḥ |
SA16n1276:396: ṣaḍ dharmā iti yajanamārvijya madhyayatamadhyāpanaṃ dānaṃ pratigrahaḥ |
SA16n1276:403: kṣatriyasya prajāpālanāya prāṇivadhe puṇyameva na pāpam |
SA16n1276:404: veda uktam-prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpakaḥ yaduta vaidikamantreṇa hatāḥ paśavaḥ svarga utpadyanta iti |
SA16n1276:406: kiñcāha yadvastuto martavyaṃ taddhanane nāsti pāpam-yathā pañcābhijña ṛṣirmantreṇa puruṣaṃ hanti |
SA16n1276:409: ato jñāyate prāṇivadho na pāpaprāpaka iti |
SA16n1276:417: atrocyate | yaduktaṃ bhavatā prāṇivadhenābhīpsitalābhādasti puṇyaguṇa iti |
SA16n1276:429: kecitsattvā api pratyarpaṇīyajīvitadhanā ityato vadhahiṃsayā yadabhīpsitaṃ tallabhate |
SA16n1276:432: yathā loka āhuḥ-ayaṃ puruṣo'lpapuṇyo bahukurvannapi na vindata iti |
SA16n1276:440: yadbravīṣi sūtra uktaṃ-yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti |
SA16n1276:447: yadāha bhavān-caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ pṛthak santi svadharmāḥ |
SA16n1276:450: yathā sūnakādīnāṃ lokānāṃ gṛhyadharmāḥ prāṇivadhāḥ sadā kriyamāṇā na pāpavimuktāḥ |
SA16n1276:453: yadi kṣatriyo rājadharmatvena prāṇān vadhyan apāpo bhavati |
SA16n1276:455: kṣatriyaḥ paraṃ prajāsu karuṇārdracittatayā vairamutsṛjya tadadhīnaṃ puṇyaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:463: yo mumūrṣuḥ sa brāhmaṇādapyupādānaṃ labhate iti |
SA16n1276:464: ime duṣkarmaṇā jīvanto'pi nocyante śīlavyasanina iti |
SA16n1276:468: (u) ukta brāhmaṇa dharma eva-cauryakāle dhanasvāmyāgatya rakṣati |
SA16n1276:476: tadā ātmahanane parahanane vā tatpāpamapi tulyam |
SA16n1276:482: corahanane'pyevaṃ syāt duṣkarmaṇā jīvanta iti yaduktaṃ tatra duṣkarmasattvātkathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet |
SA16n1276:483: yadavocaḥ coraṃ purata āgataṃ hanyādeva na vai pāpamahantā tu vindate tat iti |
SA16n1276:490: yadabravīḥ veda uktaṃ prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpaka iti |
SA16n1276:492: yaduktaṃ vastuto martavyasya kasyacidvadhe nāsti pāpamiti |
SA16n1276:505: evaṃ yaḥ parasmai dadāti tasyāpi na puṇyaṃ syāt |
SA16n1276:506: pratigrahītā pūrvādhvani svācaritadānakarmaka idānīṃ tadvipākaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:507: na hi sambhavati nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti |
SA16n1276:508: ato jñātavyaṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvādhvakṛtavadhakarmaṇāmapi vadhitā pāpaṃ labhata iti |
SA16n1276:514: tathā nocedṛṣayo rāgadveṣādikleśānāmudaye ṛddhe na hīyeran |
SA16n1276:517: jñātavyaṃ pūrvādhvakṛtapratyayānāmapi sattvānāṃ vadhitā pāpavān syāditi |
SA16n1276:529: yaḥ kuśalacittena gurutalpago brāhmaṇahantā vā bhavati |
SA16n1276:531: pārasīkādi paryantabhūmigatānāṃ janānāṃ puṇyabuddhayā mātṛbhaginyādigāmināṃ kiṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet |
SA16n1276:539: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ bahavaḥ sattvā vadhādīnācaranto bhūyasā tisṛṣu gatiṣu manuṣyagatau ca duḥkhapīḍā anubhavantīti |
SA16n1276:545: devā api sadā yuddhe'suraiḥ saha vadhyante |
SA16n1276:558: yo vadhahiṃsādibhyo viramati sa punarlābhasukhāyuḥpauṣkalyaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:561: idānīmauttarā vadanti taṇḍulaṃ svābhāvikaṃ vasanaṃ vṛkṣajam |
SA16n1276:566: ye buddhā bodhisattvāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ śrāvakā anye ca bhadantāḥ te sarve tān parityajya viramanti |
SA16n1276:581: yo dharmo'duṣṭaḥ na sa dharmaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ syāt |
SA16n1276:583: keciddharmāḥ svarūpato'kuśalā ityataḥ pariharanti yathā madyapānavikālabhojanādayaḥ |
SA16n1276:587: yadanena hetunā janavidviṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tadakuśalaṃ na bhavet |
SA16n1276:588: yaḥ prāṇātipātavirataḥ sa bahūnāṃ janānāṃ priyo bhavati |
SA16n1276:592: yathā kaścidrājārthaṃ duṣṭacorāṇāṃ hantā rājapriyo bhavati |
SA16n1276:594: yathā vadanti yo duṣkarmaṇā rājacittaṃ tarpayati |
SA16n1276:602: vadhādidharmāḥ tāḍanahiṃsanavandhanādīnāṃ duḥkho padravāṇāṃ hetava ityato jñāyate'kuśalā iti |
SA16n1276:605: yo na vadhyati taṃ rājā hanti |
SA16n1276:606: (u) yo na hanti sa hanyata ityahantāraḥ sarve mariṣyamāṇā bhaveyuḥ |
SA16n1276:608: yadi rājā jānāti ayamavadhacitta iti tadā avadhitā pratyuta satkriyate |
SA16n1276:609: ato jñāyate vadhādayo duḥkhahetavo na tvavadhādayaḥ |
SA16n1276:620: yathā sūnako na kadāpīdṛśakarmaṇā satkāraṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:624: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu hiṃsādīnāṃ vipriyaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti |
SA16n1276:632: gatāgate pādotkṣepaṇe pādāvakṣepaṇe vā sadā sūkṣmasattvān vihanti |
SA16n1276:639: teṣu sattvasaṃjñāmutpādya jighatsābuddhyā tān hatvā hananapāpaṃ labhanta iti |
SA16n1276:641: (pṛ) yathā viṣaṃ pītavāniti hetāvahetāvubhayathā puruṣaṃ hanti |
SA16n1276:642: yathā ca vahniprakramaṇaṃ jñāne'jñāne ca puruṣaṃ dahati |
SA16n1276:644: jñātavyaṃ prāṇihiṃsā hetāvahetau ca pāpaṃ prāpayati |
SA16n1276:652: sati tu vijñāne budhyate evamasati hetucitte na karma sidhyati |
SA16n1276:661: yathā mātustanagrahaṇe bālako na pāpaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:664: puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ sarvaṃ cittādhīnaṃ jāyata iti jñātavyam |
SA16n1276:666: tadā vimuktilabdho'pi asati hetau sattvān pīḍayan pāpaṃ labheta |
SA16n1276:671: yathā kaścitpuṇyaṃ karma kurvan sattvaṃ hatavānasmīti bhrānto bhavati |
SA16n1276:674: hetāvasati puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā nāstīti jñātavyam |
SA16n1276:676: tadā kathamidaṃ kuśalaṃ idamakuśalaṃ idamavyākṛtamiti vibhāgaḥ syāt |
SA16n1276:678: yathā trayaḥ puruṣāḥ sambhūya stūpapradakṣiṇaṃ kurvanti |
SA16n1276:690: yadi cittavyatiriktaṃ karmāsti asattvasaṃkhyeṣvapi puṇyapāpaṃ syāt |
SA16n1276:691: yathā sabhīraṇonmūlitaparvatopadruteṣu sattveṣu samīraṇe pāpaṃ syāt |
SA16n1276:697: tathā cennārakāḥ sattvāḥ sadā dahyante pacyante ca |
SA16n1276:704: avaśyaṃ hetucittena tadduḥkhamanubhavatāṃ puṇyaṃ bhavati natvahetucittena |
SA16n1276:712: yadi hetucittaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāsti |
SA16n1276:720: vastutastu santi brahmakāyikādīnāṃ surucirāḥ kāyā ato jñāyate na hetuṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti |
SA16n1276:724: pariśuddhena cittena bhojane na punarasti pāpamiti śrutaṃ dṛṣṭavānasi |
SA16n1276:725: tadā cittaṃ vinā nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā iti jñātavyam |
SA16n1276:729: tathā no cet sarve prāṇivadhāḥ puṇyaprāpakāḥ pāpaprāpakā vā syuḥ |
SA16n1276:735: ato jñāyate yo hetuṃ vinānyasya viṣaṃ prayacchati |
SA16n1276:751: yaḥ prājñaḥ sa pañcakāmaguṇeṣu vasannapi na pāpamāk bhavatīti manaso balam |
SA16n1276:753: na hi prājño rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mithyāsaṃjñāmutpādayati |
SA16n1276:758: tathā ca mānasaṃ karma niṣprayojanaṃ syāt |
SA16n1276:773: annavastrābhyāṃ paramupakurvatā tasmin samaye puṇyaṃ labhyate |
SA16n1276:780: anyapuruṣe ca duṣṭacittamātramutpādayati na kāyavākkarma karoti |
SA16n1276:794: ato jñāyate ātmārthatā na puṇyavatī syāditi |
SA16n1276:801: tat bhagavadguṇāḥ sattveṣu pūjyā iti smṛtvā janāḥ secante śodhayanti ca |
SA16n1276:805: nāpi sadasat nāpi ca na san nāsan iti |
SA16n1276:808: tadā anirvṛtakālīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ smṛtvā pūjayantaḥ puṇyaṃ labhante |
SA16n1276:809: yathā janāḥ pitarau jananapoṣaṇakālaṃ smṛtvā yajanti |
SA16n1276:810: tathā no cet na pitṛpūjā bhavet |
SA16n1276:826: yathā ca vastradānaṃ yadyapi paraṃ hāpayati |
SA16n1276:828: tathā ca vastradānenāpi na puṇyaṃ bhavet |
SA16n1276:830: yathoktaṃ sūtre-eko bhikṣuḥ snānagṛhe anyasya dehaṃ hastena mārjayati sma |
SA16n1276:835: yadbhavānāha-na ca cittamātreṇa puṇyaṃ labhata iti |
SA16n1276:837: yat kaścitparasyopakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tat kuśalacittamūlakam |
SA16n1276:838: yacca parasyāpakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tadakuśalacittamūlakam |
SA16n1276:839: karuṇācārī ca karuṇācittavipākena sarveṣāmupakaroti yaduta caṇḍavātavṛṣṭyanupatane'pi sūryācandramasau nakṣatrāṇi ca na bhraśyanti sadā caranti ca |
SA16n1276:849: tatpratyayena apakarṣakaraṇe'karaṇe vā sarvathā tadādhipatyena pāpaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:850: bhagavati piḍā'jananānna pāpamastīti bhavato yadi matam |
SA16n1276:857: akuśalacittavattvāt tasmin śṛṇvati aśṛṇvati vā'vaśyaṃ duḥkhaṃ janayet |
SA16n1276:862: yadi paraprabodhito jānāti tadā tasyāvaśyaṃ duḥkhopāyāso jāyeta eva |
SA16n1276:864: tadā [svāmī] prabudhya yadyapi na jānāti tathāpi tasya [paścāt] pīḍāṃ karotyeva |
SA16n1276:871: tathā ca sarve sattvāḥ sadā pāpaṃ labheran yathā parapīḍanā janāḥ |
SA16n1276:874: ato na svadehamātrātpuṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti jñātavyam |
SA16n1276:875: mārgahetutvādvinaye śīlamidaṃ paribaddhaṃ yaḥ kliṣṭacittenātmānaṃ hanti na saṃkleśātpāpaṃ labhata iti |
SA16n1276:877: yatkarma na kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā na parasattvānāmupakārakaṃ nāpakārakaṃ tadavyākṛtamityucyate |
SA16n1276:880: yatkarma na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ tadavyākṛtamiti vadanti |
SA16n1276:892: (u) bhagavānāha-dvidhā vipākaḥ mithyākāyacaryā apriyavipākaprāpiṇī samyakkāyacaryā priyavipākaprāpiṇīti |
SA16n1276:901: bhagavānāha-trīṇi duścaritāni kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritaṃ iti |
SA16n1276:910: pāpamidaṃ svakāyenāpi kriyate yatra svakāyena sattvān hanti |
SA16n1276:911: vācāpi kriyate yatna sattvān hantuṃ paramājñāpayati |
SA16n1276:912: manasāpi kriyate yat kaściccittamutpādayati yena paro mriyate |
SA16n1276:916: kadāciccittotpāde paro jānāti anena pratyayenāpi pāpakaraṃ prāṇātipātādi kuryāditi |
SA16n1276:921: yat kenacitpraśne sthāpite taṃ purata eva vañcayati |
SA16n1276:930: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ-sarvāṇi duścaritāni apriyavipākakarāṇi sucaritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti |
SA16n1276:932: yathaikameva rūpaṃ [kasyacit] priyaṃ bhavati [anyasyā] priyaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1276:946: (pṛ) samyak caritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti sūtra uktvā kasmātpunarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga utpadyata iti |
SA16n1276:949: ataḥ sūtre punarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga upapadyata iti |
SA16n1276:950: duścaritasucarite kuśalākuśalagatikakāyaṃ prāpayataḥ gṛhītakāyastatra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā vedayate |
SA16n1276:952: sucaritapratyayaṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā sukhaṃ vedayate ||
SA16n1276:961: yadvandanavastradānādi kuśalaṃ kāyikaṃ karma tat kāyasucaritam |
SA16n1276:969: anye'pi śīlasaṃvarasaṅgṛhītaṃ sucaritaṃ labhante yathā daśavarṣāyuṣkasya puruṣasya prāṇātipātaviratisamādānādviṃśativarṣāyuṣkaḥ putra utpadyate |
SA16n1276:972: (u) ābhidhārmikā āhuḥ-pṛthagjanānāṃ yat kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ kuśalaṃ karma tat sucaritamityucyate |
SA16n1276:988: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃṃ-sucaritadṛṣṭisampanno devadṛśo vā bhavati devasaṃkhyātadṛśo vā bhavati |
SA16n1276:992: sucarītaśālī yadyapi nāvaśyaṃ deveṣūtpadyate tathāpi ya āryabahumatasthāna utpadyate |
SA16n1276:996: yat samyaṅmithyāvyāmiśraṃ sucaritaṃ [tatra] mithyācaritasya prābalyānna deveṣūtpadyante |
SA16n1276:997: yathoktaṃ sūtre-bhagavānānandamavocat-paśyāmyahaṃ kecana trīṇi suritāni caranto'pi durgatāvutpadyante |
SA16n1276:999: idānīṃ sucaritasyāpi aparipūrṇatvānmaraṇa upasthite mithyādṛṣṭeścittābhimukhyāddargatau patanti |
SA16n1276:1005: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ-trividhaṃ karma kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma rūpadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma arūpyadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karmeti |
SA16n1276:1007: (u) yat karma ānarakādāca paranirmitavaśavartidevādantarāle vipākavedakaṃ tatkāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma |
SA16n1276:1010: (pṛ) avyākṛtaṃ karma aniyatavipākañca karma kimeteṣu nāntargatam |
SA16n1276:1017: (pṛ) tathā cedidaṃ tīrthikaśāstraṃ yaduta sarvapratisaṃvedyaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhañca pūrvakarmahetupratyayaṃ bhavatīti |
SA16n1276:1018: pūrvakarmavipāko yaduta kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma savipākamavipākamiti vyavasāyaguṇasya nāsti yatkiñcanaprayojanam |
SA16n1276:1021: yasya kleśāḥ karmāṇi karmavipākāśca santi tasya vimuktirnāsti |
SA16n1276:1026: tīrthikā hi vadanti sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ paratvamaparatvaṃ pūrvavipākamātramiti |
SA16n1276:1028: paśyāmastu vastutaḥ padārthāḥ pratyutpannebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ samutpadyante yathā bījāṅkurādaya iti |
SA16n1276:1046: tatra bījādaṅkura utpadyate na tu tuṣādibhyaḥ |
SA16n1276:1048: yaduktaṃ bhavatā prayāse na guṇa iti |
SA16n1276:1056: tadyathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati |
SA16n1276:1058: kiñca ya utpannā dharmāḥ sarve te karmamūlakāḥ |
SA16n1276:1071: purā kila janāḥ kuśalamācaritavanta ityataḥ śālitaṇḍulāḥ svata ajāyanta |
SA16n1276:1072: ato jñāyate karmabhūlakatvāt māṣānmāṣo jāyata iti |
SA16n1276:1075: sarvasattvānāṃ sādhāraṇakarmavipāko yaduta caṅkramaṇāsthānakarmapratyayalābhāt kṣityādayo bhavanti |
SA16n1276:1076: prakāśakarmapratyayalābhāccandrasūryādayo bhavanti iti jñātavyaṃ janyaṃ vastu sarvaṃ karmamūlakamiti |
SA16n1276:1092: (u) yaḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu daśākuśalakarmāṇi samutpādayati sa kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate |
SA16n1276:1102: yathā tiktakāravelle vidyamānāni catvāri mahābhūtāni sarvāṇi tiktarasāni bhavanti |
SA16n1276:1106: yathā bako brahmā brahmāṇamāmantrayāha-mopagaccha śramaṇaṃ gautamam |
SA16n1276:1109: anye'pi brahma [kāyikā] devāḥ tatra bhavantaṃ tādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ dūṣayanti |
SA16n1276:1116: (u) yadīdamakuśalaṃ karma tadā kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayata ityataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktam |
SA16n1276:1125: (pṛ) kathaṃ tatra samutpāditaṃ kuśalaṃ karma kāmadhātuvedanīyavipākaṃ bhavet |
SA16n1276:1128: yathā ca rūpārūpyadhātusamutpāditākuśalakarmaṇaḥ kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate |
SA16n1276:1130: (pṛ) yo rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ na sa utpādayati kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma |
SA16n1276:1131: (u) tatra nāstyayaṃ hetuḥ yat kāmadhātugato rūpārūpya[pratisaṃyuktaṃ] kuśalaṃ karmaiva samutpādayati na rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma samutpādayati iti |
SA16n1276:1132: ucyate ca yuṣmābhiḥ kāmadhātugataḥ kāmadhātukamavyākṛtaṃ cittaṃ samutpādayatīti |
SA16n1276:1135: sūtre bhagavān hastakadevaputrametadavocat-cittaviharaṇe audārikavedanāsaṃjñāṃ manasikuru iti |
SA16n1276:1137: ayaṃ kuśalacittena yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti buddhaṃ pūjayati tat sarvaṃ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ cittam |
SA16n1276:1138: tathā no cet audārikasaṃjñeti nākhyā syāt |
SA16n1276:1140: yathāha bhagavān triṣu vastuṣu atṛpto'smin loke āyuṣo'nte'navataptadeveṣūpapatsye yaduta tathāgataṃ paśyāmi dharmaṃ śṛṇomi saṅghaṃ satkaromīti |
SA16n1276:1158: (pṛ) kimetāni trīṇi karmāṇi niyatavipākāni niyatakālāni ca |
SA16n1276:1164: tathā cet pañcānantaryāṇi niyatavipākānīti na syāt |
SA16n1276:1171: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ karma nāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharma eva vedyate |
SA16n1276:1172: vedyate cet dṛṣṭadharma eva vedanīyaṃ syāt nānyatra |
SA16n1276:1176: yathā tathāgata āryeṣu mātāpitrādiṣu samutpāditaṃ yat kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma tat dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākam |
SA16n1276:1180: yathā cakravartinaḥ karma bodhisattvasya vā karma |
SA16n1276:1184: yathā mallikādevī svānnabhāgadānena praṇidadhāti dṛṣṭa evādhvani rājamahiṣī bhaveyamiti |
SA16n1276:1189: (pṛ) yasmin kṣaṇe karmotpadyate tatsamanantarakṣaṇa eva kiṃ vipāko vedyate |
SA16n1276:1194: yo garbhamadhyastho ye ca middhonmattādayaḥ te karma sañcinvanti na vā (u)
SA16n1276:1197: (pṛ) yo'syāṃ bhūmau vītarāgaḥ sa pṛthivīkarma karoti na vā |
SA16n1276:1206: uktañca sūtre-prahīṇapuṇyapāpakarmako'rhanniti sa nopacinoti puṇyakarmāṇi apuṇyakarmāṇyāneñjyakarmāṇi ca |
SA16n1276:1207: ato vedanāparyavasannaṃ karmeti na nūtnaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti |
SA16n1276:1211: sūtre hyuktaṃ-sa karmāṇi vidhvasya na sañcinoti nopacinoti niruddhaṃ na tathā bhavati ityādi |
SA16n1276:1216: aniyataṃ karma kimasti kiṃ vā nāsti |
SA16n1276:1218: yat karma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ vā upapadyavedanīyavipākaṃ vā tadūrdhvavedanīyavipākaṃ vā bhavati |
SA16n1276:1223: (u) ya imāni trividhakarmāṇi vivecayati sa samyagdṛṣṭimutpādayati |
SA16n1276:1227: udāsīnasya kadācinmithyādṛṣṭirbhavet yaduta kuśalasyākuśalasya vā nāsti vipāka iti |
SA16n1276:1231: pāpo'pi paśyati bhadrāṇi yāvatpāpaṃ na pacyate |
SA16n1276:1232: yadā ca pacyate pāpamatha pāpo pāpāni paśyati ||
SA16n1276:1233: bhadro'pi paśyati pāpāni yāvadbhadraṃ na pacyate |
SA16n1276:1234: yadā ca pacyate bhadramatha bhadro bhadrāṇi paśyati ||
SA16n1276:1236: yaḥ pūrvādhvani puṇyavān san āyuṣo'nte prabalakuśalacittamutpādayati iti |
SA16n1276:1238: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prajānīyāt ||
SA16n1276:1259: hetau phalopacāraḥ yathānnasya dātā pañcārthānāṃ dāteti |
SA16n1276:1287: tatra saumanasyamapi saṃjñāvikalpādutpadyata iti na vipākaḥ syāt |
SA16n1276:1296: tacca daurmanasyaṃ jñānapraheyaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi pariharati |
SA16n1276:1297: daurmanasya triṣvadhvasu kleśaṃ janayati yaduta pūrvamahaṃ duḥkhī idānīṃ duḥkhī āyatyāñca duḥkhīti |
SA16n1276:1304: yathā ca rogī kaścit [roga-] duḥkhābhihataḥ punaḥ kāyacittapīḍanayātyadhikadaurmanasyopāyāso bhavati |
SA16n1276:1312: yathoktaṃ sūtre-bhagavān prasenajitaṃ rājānamapṛcchat-api tvaṃ [mahārāja] kāśīkosaleṣu priyo'si iti |
SA16n1276:1313: uktañca-devā rūpāsaktā rūpakāmāḥ rūpe vinaṣṭe daurmanasyajātā bhavanti |
SA16n1276:1320: bahavaśca sattvā daurmanasyakaraṃ parān sampīḍayantaḥ sadaurmanasyasampīḍanavipākaṃ labhante |
SA16n1276:1326: narakādivipāko na vipāka iti kiṃ sambhavet |
SA16n1276:1327: ato na sambhavati vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttamavipāka iti |
SA16n1276:1344: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yo'yaṃ puruṣo nitayaṃ samāpattau vedanīyavipākaṃ karmopacinoti na sa supade'vatarati iti |
SA16n1276:1347: yat kasyacit kleśā anivāryāḥ tadyathā ṣaṇḍādīnāṃ kāmaḥ |
SA16n1276:1349: yannarakādau pāpākuśalopapattyāyatane yathopapattyāyanañca na mārgaṃ bhāvayati |
SA16n1276:1351: (pṛ) kecit pūrvaṃ vidyāvihīnebhyaḥ pūrvapuruṣebhyo na prajānanti idaṃ kuśalamiti |
SA16n1276:1352: tadā te na dadanti yat sa yadi matto dānaṃ labdhvā akuśalāni karoti tadā ahaṃ bhāgī syāmiti |
SA16n1276:1368: kūṭamānādayaḥ kuhanāyāḥ pratyayāḥ iti kretāraḥ pāpinaḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1276:1369: pratigrahītā dānasya pratyaya iti puṇyabhāk syāt |
SA16n1276:1370: ye kūpataṭākādyupabhoktāraḥ te sarve puṇyabhājaḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1276:1371: tathā ca svasya puṇyaṃ na syāt |
SA16n1276:1381: bhūyasā te trividhaviṣakaluṣitacittāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāsaktā na vyavasyanti kuśalabhāvanām |
SA16n1276:1383: brāhmaṇādaya ātmānaṃ sujanabhāvitadharmacaya iti kīrtayanto na samyak paśyanti samāpatticittasamādhānāni dharmān |
SA16n1276:1385: ato dātā avītarāgāya dadan pāpabāhulyaṃ labheta |
SA16n1276:1386: janāḥ pitṝn pūjayantaḥ putrabhāryābandhūn samārādhayantaḥ [yadi] jñātvā vijānanti sarve pāpaṃ prāpayeyuriti |
SA16n1276:1404: ghanikatvahetoḥ kṛtānāṃ pāpānāmapi dātā bhāgī syāt |
SA16n1276:1405: tathā ca brāhmaṇā na dānaṃ pratigṛhṇīyuḥ |
SA16n1276:1407: idānīntu brāhmaṇāḥ kevalaṃ pratigṛhṇanti na prayacchanti |
SA16n1276:1408: ato jñāyate sa duṣṭaḥ panthā iti |
SA16n1276:1409: yathā ca rājāno yathādharmaṃ prajāḥ pālayantaḥ pāpino'pi syuḥ |
SA16n1276:1420: avītarāga āsvādābhiniviṣṭa ityato dātā pāpī syāt |
SA16n1276:1422: tvadannaṃ bhuktvā nākuśalaṃ kariṣyāmīti bhoktāraṃ sadā pratijñāpya paścāddāsyati |
SA16n1276:1424: (pṛ) nanu sūtre'pyuktam-yadi bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati tatpratyayāt sa dānapatirapramāṇapuṇyaṃ prasūta iti |
SA16n1276:1425: tatpratyayena puṇyalābhī cet kathaṃ na pāpabhāk bhavati |
SA16n1276:1426: (u) yadi sa bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati |
SA16n1276:1433: na tu pratigrahītuḥ puṇye pāpe vā dātā bhāgaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:1434: ato na tatpuṇyapāpapratyayena dātā puṇyapāpabhāk bhavati |
SA16n1276:1436: tathāpi svaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā svakṛtatrividhakarmāpekṣya bhavati |
SA16n1276:1440: (u) tathā cet pravrajinaḥ śīlādin dhṛtvā sapuṇyo bhavatīdamupekṣitaṃ syāt |
SA16n1276:1447: tāni hi karmāṇi hetukāla eva vāryāṇi |
SA16n1276:1449: ato buddhā [bhagavanto] hetukāla eva vinayāya dharmamupadiśanti |
SA16n1276:1469: yena karmaṇā savyābādhye loke yathāvaivartinaraka upapadyate |
SA16n1276:1470: anyatra ca savyābādhye'kuśala vipākāyatane samupapadyate yadi vā tiryañca ekatyāḥ pretā vā |
SA16n1276:1472: yena karmaṇā avyābādhye loka upapadyate yathā rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ kāmadhātau ca devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ |
SA16n1276:1474: yena karmaṇā samutpadyate savyābādhye'vyābādhye ca loke yadi vā tiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ |
SA16n1276:1476: yat karmalokadvayavigarhitaṃ iha vigarhitamamutra ca vigarhitam |
SA16n1276:1477: tat pāpaṃ karma puruṣaḥ kṛtvā tamasi patitaḥ san na yaśaḥ śrutavān bhavatīti kṛṣṇamityucyate |
SA16n1276:1484: akuśalakriyā ca gurujaneṣu yanmātāpitṛṣu anyeṣu sajjaneṣu ca |
SA16n1276:1485: sattvānāmahitaṃ kṛtvā na kiñcidapi kṛpāṃ karoti |
SA16n1276:1486: yathā sattvān hanti samastaṃ taddhanaṃ vā'paharati |
SA16n1276:1502: tṛtīyaṃ karma durbalaṃ kuśalākuśalavyāmiśratvāt tadvipākaṃ yugapatpratisaṃvedayate |
SA16n1276:1504: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ-yadakuśalaṃ karma durgatau vipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tadādyaṃ karma |
SA16n1276:1506: yat kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu vyāmiśravipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ karma |
SA16n1276:1513: sa savyābādhyaṃ kāyasaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ vāksaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ manaḥsaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhye loke utpadyate |
SA16n1276:1514: tatra savyābādhye loka utpannaṃ santaṃ savyābādhyāḥ sparśāḥ spṛśanti iti |
SA16n1276:1515: ato jñāyate yat sattvānāṃ kṛṣṇaduḥkhalokotpādakaṃ tadādyaṃ karmeti |
SA16n1276:1518: yathoktaṃ sūtre-sukhināṃ manuṣyāṇāmapi santi ṣaṭ sparśā iti |
SA16n1276:1519: devamanuṣyairanubhūyamānā viṣayā yena amanorūpā na bhavanti tat dvitīyaṃ karma |
SA16n1276:1542: loke ślādhyataraṃ sāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karma śuklamityucyate |
SA16n1276:1550: yadi dṛṣṭa eva dharme vedyate tadā savyābādhavipāko laghurbhavati |
SA16n1276:1551: tasya gurutvātkrameṇa kṣipraṃ vā avaivartike narake patati |
SA16n1276:1552: trīṇyānantaryāṇi puṇyakṣetraguṇagauravādānantaryāṇītyucyante yaduta saṅghabhedaḥ tathāgataśarīre duṣṭacittena lohitotpādanamarhadvadhaḥ |
SA16n1276:1557: (pṛ) anyeṣāmāryajanānāṃ vadha ānantaryaṃ labhate na vā |
SA16n1276:1560: yastathāgataṃ tāḍayati na tu lohitamutpādayati sa gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:1565: tadā ekasminneva kāye vipākavedanā kṣīyate na vā |
SA16n1276:1569: (u) yadyadharmamadharmato jñātvā imaṃ dharmaṃ dharmato jānāti |
SA16n1276:1573: yat kaścit buddhātsaṅghaṃ prabhidya ātmānaṃ praśaṃsati mahān śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pūjya iti |
SA16n1276:1582: kecidāhuḥ imāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni pūrvādhvani parān vighnayantaḥ kuśalamūlamārgalabdhāstatpratyayamidānīṃ tadvipākaṃ vindanta iti |
SA16n1276:1612: ato madyapānaṃ yaḥ śāsti sa pāpāṅgaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:1627: (u) narakavedanīyavipākaṃ karmeti yathā ṣaṭpādābhidharme lokaprajñaptau vistṛtam |
SA16n1276:1629: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yaḥ prāṇātipātanirataḥ sa naraka utpadyate |
SA16n1276:1635: bhavāṃstu kevalamāha narakeṣu manuṣyeṣu votpadyata iti |
SA16n1276:1636: idānīṃ viśiṣya vaktavyaṃ kiṃ karma narakavipākamātravedakamiti |
SA16n1276:1642: śīlabhedinā dṛṣṭibhedinā ca kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati |
SA16n1276:1649: yathā kaścidakuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā paścātprīyā praśaṃsan na parityaktumicchati |
SA16n1276:1658: akuśalasvabhāvena janena kṛtaṃ pāpakarma narakāya bhavati |
SA16n1276:1660: sadākuśala karmacāriṇā kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati |
SA16n1276:1661: yaḥ sambhramakāraṇaṃ vinā [sasaṃbhrama] makuśalaṃ karma karoti |
SA16n1276:1665: yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā ca prajñāṃ nābhyasyati |
SA16n1276:1678: sa gurukaṃ pāpakarma kṛtvā narakavipākaṃ vedayate |
SA16n1276:1679: yaḥ pāpaṃ kṛtvā na kuśalaṃ pratiśrayate |
