SA16n1276:2537: sattvānāṃ vidyamānāḥ sarvā akuśalaparābhavahānipīḍā akuśalaiḥ [karmabhi]reva bhavanti |
SA16n1276:2539: yathā sainikavyādhādayo nānena karmaṇā bahumānaṃ labhante |
SA16n1276:2540: coravadhapratyayaṃ dhanabhānaṃ labhata iti yat bhavata āśayaḥ |
SA16n1276:2553: akuśalacārī tamasastamaḥ praviṣṭaḥ pravṛttimārgatritayānna niryāṇaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:2559: kiñcākuśalacārī svakāyaṃ kāmayannapi na vastutaḥ svātmānaṃ kāmayate |
SA16n1276:2562: puruṣo'yaṃ kāyasaṅgataḥ tadyathā'mitracoreṇa [saṅgataḥ] svātmana eva duḥkhakārakatvāt |
SA16n1276:2566: akuśalakarmacaryā yadyapīdānīṃ nābhivyajyate vipāke tu adhyavasīyate |
SA16n1276:2569: yathā vā ṛṇamalpamapi krameṇa vṛddhyā vardhate |
SA16n1276:2570: parasya kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ paraḥ sadā na vismarati |
SA16n1276:2578: akuśalakarmaphalāt vihāyasā gatvā samudre nimajyāpi na vimuktisthānaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:2584: kiñcākuśalaṃ karma buddhabodhisattvairarhadbhirāryaiḥ pañcabhijñairmaharṣibhiḥ puṇyapāpavedibhiravigītaṃ na bhavati |
SA16n1276:2586: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣamakuśalacittavaipulya eva bhāvavyāmohavikṣepopāyāsādhiduḥkhairvikṛtamukhavarṇaḥ pumānaprīto dṛśyata iti |
SA16n1276:2591: triṣu karmasu kiṃ gurutaraṃ-kiṃ kāyikaṃ karma,
SA16n1276:2592: vācikaṃ karma kiṃ vā mānasaṃ karma |
SA16n1276:2599: yathā kaścidimaṃ sattvaṃ hanmīti cittamutpādya kāyavāgbhyāṃ tatkarma sādhayati |
SA16n1276:2610: mānasaṃ karma mahattaramiti cet [tadā] dānapuṇyaṃ labheta |
SA16n1276:2617: ācaritā kasmāt sulabhamidaṃ karma tyaktvā durācaraṇaṃ dānādikarma kuryāt |
SA16n1276:2628: cittaṃ laghu calaṃ durdamamityato'kuśalākaraṇaṃ na kiñcit |
SA16n1276:2646: utpadyamānaṃ vijñaptikarma sarvaṃ kāyavacasā bhavati na mānasakarmaṇā |
SA16n1276:2647: yathā parapuruṣanindā avaśyaṃ vākkarmādhīnā mṛṣāvādapāpaṃ gamayati |
SA16n1276:2648: yatpūrvamuktaṃ caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ prāṇātipātapāpaṃ labhate yaduta sattvasattā,
SA16n1276:2650: jighatsācittaṃ tajjīvitoccheda iti caturbhirvastubhiḥ pāpaṃ sidhyati |
SA16n1276:2652: yathā cāha bhagavān- yo bālaka ājanma karuṇāmabhyasyati |
SA16n1276:2653: sa kimakuśalaṃ karmotpādayituṃ śankoti akuśalaṃ karma cetayate vā iti |
SA16n1276:2654: ato jñāyate kāyikaṃ karmaivotpādayati na mānasaṃ karma iti |
SA16n1276:2655: atrocyate | yat bhavānāha-kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmaiva gurutaraṃ na mānasam iti |
SA16n1276:2659: cittaṃ dharmasya vai mūlaṃ cittaṃ prabhuśca kiṅkaraḥ |
SA16n1276:2660: śubhāśubhaṃ tatsmarati vacanaṃ caraṇañca tat || iti |
SA16n1276:2664: vinā cittaṃ nāsti kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma |
SA16n1276:2665: sūtre vacanācca vijñaptikarma kṛtvā niyamena vipākaṃ vedayate |
SA16n1276:2670: yathāha sūtram-purā'haṃ saptavarṣāṇi karuṇāsamudācaraṇānneemaṃ lokaṃ saptamahākalpān pratinivartāmīti |
SA16n1276:2676: yathā kuśalacārī āyuṣo'nte mithyādṛṣṭimutpādayan narake patati |
SA16n1276:2680: āha-yo lokottarāṃ samyagdṛṣṭimutpādayati sa varṣaśatasahasyāṇi saṃsāre saṃsarannapi na durgatau patati iti |
SA16n1276:2682: yathoktamupālisūtre-tīrthiko maharṣiḥ [āgatya vadet] ekena manodaṇḍena nālandaṃ bhasmīkaromīti iti |
SA16n1276:2683: yathā daṇḍakāraṇyāni ṛṣiṇāṃ manodaṇḍena [bhasmī-] kṛtāni iti |
SA16n1276:2685: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yo'yamatra mṛtaḥ sa eva narakaṃ praviśati |
SA16n1276:2692: yanmanasā kāyaṃ vācañca niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā carati tatkāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmetyucyate |
SA16n1276:2694: na tu vinā mānasaṃ karma kāyikasya vācikasya vā vipākaḥ |
SA16n1276:2695: ato jñāyate mānasaṃ karma gurutaraṃ na kāyikaṃ vācikam | iti |
SA16n1276:2696: yadbhavatoktaṃ kāyikavācikakarmaṇorniyamena satyatvāt yathā pañcānantaryāṇi kāyaṃ vāca[ñcopādāya] kriyanta ityato gurutarāṇīti |
SA16n1276:2698: yasmāt cetanā gurvī vastu ca guru tasmātkarma guru |
SA16n1276:2701: yathā cittabalamātreṇa saddharmapadaṃ praviśati tathā cittabalenaiva cānantaryapāpaṃ sampādayati |
SA16n1276:2704: uktaṃ bhavatā kāye vāk ca karma vastu niṣpādayatīti |
SA16n1276:2713: yathoktaṃ sūtre-dṛḍhacittamutpādya tadaiva deveṣūtpadyate narake vā'dhaḥ patati iti |
SA16n1276:2727: yaduktaṃ bhavatā puṇyaṃ pāpañca sulabhaṃ syāditi |
SA16n1276:2729: cittabalasya tanutvāt janāḥ sulabhaṃ tyaktvā durlabhaṃ kurvanti |
SA16n1276:2733: sattvā avarajñānabalāḥ karuṇādi mānasaṃ karma carituṃ na samarthā ityato dānādi kurvanti |
SA16n1276:2737: sa yadi bodhibalayuktaḥ tadā akṣīṇaṃ kuśaladharmaṃ labhetaiva |
SA16n1276:2738: yaduktaṃ mānasaṃ karma na kasyacidupakaroti apakaroti vā iti |
SA16n1276:2745: yathā kalpādau taṇḍulāni svayamutpadyante puruṣāṇāṃ daśavarṣāyuḥkāle prāpte tatsarvaṃ nābhūta |
SA16n1276:2786: tat sāmānyataḥ pratyuktaṃ yaduta kāyikavācikakarmadharmabhede mānasakarmadharmabhedaḥ |
SA16n1276:2787: kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma avaśyaṃ vijñāpayitrā sidhyati |
SA16n1276:2788: yathā caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ siddhaṃ prāṇātipātapāpaṃ na mānasakarma vinā bhavati |
SA16n1276:2789: laukikāḥ satvā vadanti kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmākuśalaṃ na tathā mānasamiti |
SA16n1276:2790: mānasaṃ karma ca na janeṣūpaprayujyate nāpyupalabhyate'stīti |
SA16n1276:2792: tallakṣaṇatvānmānasaṃ karmaiva gurutaraṃ na kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ vā ||
SA16n1276:2810: ato vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathaṃ jñāyate karmata utpadyata iti |
SA16n1276:2813: padārthā nānāviprakīrṇajātaya iti jñātavyaṃ heturapi bhidyata iti |
SA16n1276:2814: yathā paśyāmaḥ alakasandukakodravādīnāṃ bhedaḥ tadbījamasamaṃ jñāpayati iti |
SA16n1276:2817: kiñca sajjanāḥ śraddhadhante yat karmopādāya kāya upādīyata iti |
SA16n1276:2822: yadi karmopādāya śarīramupādīyate tadā tat nivartanīyam |
SA16n1276:2827: īśvarādīnāṃ kāraṇatve tu na nivartayituṃ śakyate |
SA16n1276:2837: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ padārthāḥ karmasambhūtā iti |
SA16n1276:2841: ato jñāyate karmataḥ śarīramupādīyate na maheśvarādibhya iti |
SA16n1276:2842: laukikāḥ svayaṃ jānanti padārthāḥ karmahetasambhūtā iti |
SA16n1276:2846: ato jñāyate karmato vipāko labhyata iti |
SA16n1276:2847: janā īśvarādīn kāraṇaṃ vadanto'pi karmāṇi niśrayante yaduta svadehaṃ khedayanta upavāsādīn svīkurvanti ca |
SA16n1276:2850: sarve cāryāḥ śīlādikuśaladharmān niśrayante yato jānanti karmahetorloko'stīti |
SA16n1276:2858: yathā upari vṛkṣe phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā jānanti vṛkṣastaddheturiti |
SA16n1276:2860: durgatau mohādayaḥ prabalā iti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ durgatikāraṇam |
SA16n1276:2869: sajjānānāṃ citte yadyakuśalamutpadyate tadaiva prayatnena nigṛhyate |
SA16n1276:2872: tathā nocet yatheṣṭaṃ kuryaḥ idameva paramaṃ sukhamiti |
SA16n1276:2873: tadā hatvā sattvānāṃ bhojanaṃ paradravyāpahāraḥ yadi vā parastrīgamanaṃ imānyapi sukhāni bhaveyuḥ |
SA16n1276:2883: catussatyajñānāt satyāśrayāḥ kleśā na kadāpi punarudbhavanti |
SA16n1276:2888: yathā śuṣkabhūmau bīje ca dagdhe na sarvo'ṅkuraḥ prarohati |
SA16n1276:2889: evaṃ vijñānasthitikṣetre tṛṣṇāsnehānabhiṣyandite karmabīje ca tattvajñānadagdhe nordhvadehāṅkuraḥ prarohati |
SA16n1276:2890: vidvānetadvastu prajñāya vijñānasthitikṣetraṃ śoṣayituṃ karma bījaṃ dagdhuñca vīryamadhiṣṭhāya prayatate |
SA16n1276:2891: ato jñāyate karma kāyopādānasya pratyaya iti ||
SA16n1276:2913: sattvā duḥkhābhihatā skandhakāyaṃ parijihīrṣavo vibhavaṃ sukhaṃ manyante |
SA16n1276:2915: yathoktaṃ sūtre-aihikaṃ saumanasyamāmuṣmikaṃ saumanasyaṃ ihalaukikasukhavedanā āmuṣmikasukhavedanā ityarthamabhidadhāti iti |
SA16n1276:2916: kiñcāha-aihikaṃ daurmanasyamāmuṣmikaṃ daurmanasyaṃ ihalaukikaduḥkhavedanā āmuṣmikaduḥkhavedanā ityarthamabhidadhāti |
SA16n1276:2947: uktañca sūtre-nirodhaṃ varjayitvā rāgo daurmanasyañca sarve'kuśalā dharmā iti |
SA16n1276:2950: yathocyate dveṣo daurmanasyamiti tadā jñāyate nandiḥ rāga ityupyucyata iti |
SA16n1276:2951: ato'ṣṭādaśamanaupavicāreṣu na kleśā ucyante kevalaṃ vedanā ucyante |
SA16n1276:2957: tṛtīyavedanāyāmucyate pṛthagjanā asyā vedanāyā na jānanti samudayaṃ,
SA16n1276:2960: na jānanti ādīnavaṃ na jānanti nissaraṇam |
SA16n1276:2962: ime pṛthagjanāḥ sadā pañcadharmān tān na jānantītyato'duḥkhāsukhavedanāyāṃ sadā'vidyānuśayaṃ rvanti |
SA16n1276:2975: asati rāge na janma bhavati ityataḥ pṛthagucyate bhavarāga iti |
SA16n1276:2980: pradarśayati ca bhagavān tatra[ā'pi] bhavaḥ sūkṣmaḥ pravartata iti |
SA16n1276:2982: daśākuśalakarmapatheṣu caturṣu bandhaneṣu ca kāmarāga ityākhyā bhavati |
SA16n1276:2988: ayaṃ rāgo yadyadhamācaraṇaḥ tadā akuśalarāga ityākhyā |
SA16n1276:2992: yadi vā mātṛbhaginīsvasrācāryapatnīḥ pravrajitapatnīṃ svapatnīṃ vā'mārgeṇa jigamiṣati |
SA16n1276:3001: yadalpadravyasyālpadānaṃ labdhvā priyataraṃ kāmayate na tṛpyati |
SA16n1276:3005: ayañca rāgo dvividhaḥ kāmarāgaḥ upakaraṇarāga iti |
SA16n1276:3023: yathā kaścit anena vastunā duḥkhito vastvantaraṃ paryeṣate |
SA16n1276:3024: yathoktam-sukhī na paryeṣate duḥkhī tu bahu paryeṣate |
SA16n1276:3051: tadyathā priyarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā citte idaṃ [priya]miti vacanaṃ karoti |
SA16n1276:3066: yadi vā tadrūpe yadi vākāre yadi vā sparśe yadi vā subhāṣite [mithyāmanaskāramutpādayati] |
SA16n1276:3075: yathā śuddhaṃ vastra [mapagatakalaṅkaṃ] samyaṅ malena dūṣyate |
SA16n1276:3083: tadyathā gṛdhro vā kaṅko vā iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
SA16n1276:3084: aśucyādi vilokya apratihatālambanasya kāmarāgo vegaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:3087: strīrūpādyalambane prīto nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti paricchedañca gṛhṇāti |
SA16n1276:3093: yaḥ pravṛttakāmarāgaḥ [tat-] kṣāntiṃ vedayan na parityajati |
SA16n1276:3097: kāmarāgasya hitāsvādamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā tadānīnavamajānataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate |
SA16n1276:3098: ṛtunā ca kāmarāga utpadyate yathā vasantādayaḥ |
SA16n1276:3099: sthānavaśena ca kāmarāga utpadyate yathā kiñcitsthānaṃ yatra cirādārabhya kāmacāro bahuśo'bhyastaḥ |
SA16n1276:3105: pakṣiṇāṃ kalaravaṃ strīṇāṃ sukumārabhūṣaṇarutāni subhāṣitāni vā śṛṇvataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate |
SA16n1276:3113: alabdhacittasamādhānasya antaḥ sattvaṃ paśyato bahiḥ rūpādi paśyataśca kāmarāgo bhavati |
SA16n1276:3119: (pṛ) kāmarāgasya ke doṣāḥ santīti kāmaḥ prahātavyaḥ |
SA16n1276:3136: kiñcāha-vidyamānāni duḥkhāni bhikṣavaḥ kasmādbhavantīti manasikṛtvā jānīdhvaṃ [tāni] kāmahetukāni |
SA16n1276:3143: strīṇāṃ kāyacittamaśuci śakṛnmṛtsu [vidyamāna] vṛścikavat daṣṭvā dūṣayati |
SA16n1276:3145: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yathā śvā raktaliptamasthikaṅkālaṃ svādayitvā [sva]lālāyogānmanyate yanmadhura [mida] miti |
SA16n1276:3146: tathā rāgyapi nīrase kāme mithyāviparyāsabalena manyate yadidaṃ rasāsvādamiti |
SA16n1276:3150: sattvānāṃ kāmarāgapratyayaṃ sukhamalpaṃ duḥkhaṃ bahu kena kim [syāt] |
SA16n1276:3151: kāmatṛṣṇāvān sukhahetoḥ sarvaduḥkhānyanubhavati yadutārjanakāle duḥkhaṃ rakṣaṇakāle duḥkhamupabhogakāle'pi duḥkham |
SA16n1276:3152: yathā kṛṣivāṇijyasaṃgrāmarājasevāparicaryādīni arjane duḥkhaṃ hānabhītyā rakṣaṇe duḥkhaṃ,
SA16n1276:3154: iṣṭasaṅgame prītiralpā virahe ca duḥkhaṃ bahu |
SA16n1276:3161: kleśā rāgamupādāya bhavanti yathā kāmarāgāt kleśāḥ sarve samudbhavanti |
SA16n1276:3166: yathā kṛṣṇaśuklā gauḥ svayamabaddhā rajjunā paramabaddhā |
SA16n1276:3171: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre-pūrvā koṭirna [prajñāyate] avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ sandhāvatāṃ saṃsaratām iti |
SA16n1276:3172: api coktaṃ sūtre-rāgaprahāṇādrūpaṃ prahīyate yāvadvijñānaṃ prahīyata iti |
SA16n1276:3181: kāmarāgaḥ sadā kusumāramukhataḥ samudācaratītyataḥ paramamakuśalaṃ nāma |
SA16n1276:3182: kiñca sattvāścittapramodena kāmarāge pravartante yāvanmaśakapipīlikā[daya]ḥ sarve'pi āhāramaithunayoḥ pravartante |
SA16n1276:3183: sa kāmarāgo nānākāraṇaiḥ puruṣāṇāṃ cittaṃ badhnāti yaduta mātṛpitṛsvasṛbhaginīpatnīsaṃjñā dhanādayaḥ |
SA16n1276:3191: yathā rūpāṇāmāsvādādhyavasānamityuktaṃ yaduta rūpaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhaṃ saumanasyam |
SA16n1276:3196: yasmāt sattvāḥ kāmaḥ sukhaṃ dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ samāpattiḥ sukhamiti saṃrajyante |
SA16n1276:3199: yathoktaṃ-yasya vairāgyaṃ sa paramaṃ sukhamanuprāpnoti iti |
SA16n1276:3200: kiñcāha-yaḥ sarvasukhalābhamicchati tena sarvāṇi kāmasukhāni tyaktavyāni |
SA16n1276:3206: yasya cittaṃ rāgatṛṣṇāviviktaṃ tasya sarve duḥkhopāyāsā niruddhāḥ |
SA16n1276:3213: unmattavat pramattavacca na jānāti kurūpaṃ surūpam |
SA16n1276:3216: kāmarāgo na vijānāti dharmaṃ andhatamasi ajñānavat |
SA16n1276:3223: yathoktabhāvanāyogī so'yaṃ tarati vai tadā || iti |
SA16n1276:3231: (u) kāmarāgabahulaḥ strīrūpakusumagandhamālanṛttavādyagīteṣu pramudito veśyāgṛhapānagoṣṭhīgāmī mahāsamājanāṭakarasikaḥ sānurāgālāpānanditaḥ sadā paritoṣitacittaḥ prasannavadanaḥ sākūtasakākusasmitābhilāṣī durlabhakopaḥ sulabhapramodo bhūyasā dayālucittaḥ punaḥ punarvyādhitacapalagātraḥ svadehādhyāsakta ityevamādi rāgabahulasya lakṣaṇam |
SA16n1276:3237: yathoktaṃ-rūpasukhino [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparāgino rūpamuditā rūpavipariṇāme duḥkhacittā viharanti iti |
SA16n1276:3239: bhagavān tatra tatra sūtre nānādṛṣṭāntairimaṃ kāmarāgaṃ garhayati yaduta [āśī] viṣopamaḥ,
SA16n1276:3262: (u) yaḥ sarvamanityamiti prajānāti na tasya kāmarāgo'sti |
SA16n1276:3263: yathoktaṃ sūtre-anityasaṃjñā [bhikṣavaḥ] bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā tadā sarvaḥ kāmarāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvaḥ rūparāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvo bhavarāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvāvidyā paryādīryate sarvo'smimānaḥ paryādīryate samuddhanyate iti |
SA16n1276:3264: yaḥ paśyati loko duḥkhaṃ duḥkhahetuḥ rāga iti |
SA16n1276:3266: yo nityaṃ smarati mayā jātijarāvyādhimaraṇānyanubhavitavyānīti sa imaṃ rāgaṃ prajahāti |
SA16n1276:3273: kuśalapratyayasampannasya kāmarāgaḥ prahīyate yaduta śīlaviśuddhyā dīnyekādaśasamādhyupakaraṇānīti paścānmārgasatye vakṣyate |
SA16n1276:3280: yathā jñāyate rūgṇasya trivastusampannasya tasminneva samaye vyādhiḥ śāmyati iti |
SA16n1276:3282: kasmāt bhavān bravīti aśubhādi anityatādi ca |
SA16n1276:3285: ādau aśubhayā rāgo vāryate paścādanityatājñānena prahīyate |
SA16n1276:3286: aśubhayā audariko rāgo'panīyata itīdaṃ bahūnāṃ jñātameva |
SA16n1276:3299: kaścit dveṣī parān nindituṃ daṇḍena tāḍayituñcecchati |
SA16n1276:3311: kaścit dveṣī sahasā kiñcit gṛhītvā nānākāraṇai [rna] tyaktumicchati |
SA16n1276:3312: yathā siṃho nadīṃ vigāhya tattīranimittaṃ gṛhītvā āmaraṇaṃ na [tato] vinivartate |
SA16n1276:3315: kaścit dveṣī hitalābhinaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā citte mātsaryamutpādayati |
SA16n1276:3317: kaścit dveṣī sadā kalahapriyo dhṛṣṭamanovāg bhavati |
SA16n1276:3320: kaścit dveṣī ciramātsaryeṇa śīlamupadiṣṭo'pi punaḥ pratilomayati |
SA16n1276:3323: kaścit dveṣī kiñcidabhīṣṭasya amanaḥprahlādanasya vastuno lābhe kṣubhitacitto bhavati |
SA16n1276:3326: kaścit dveṣī asukumāravacanaḥ sadā bhrukuṭilālaso na manaḥ pūrvamālāpaṃ yojayati |
SA16n1276:3332: kaścit dveṣī kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ satīrthyaṃ saṃspṛṣṭopāyāsaṃ karoti |
SA16n1276:3335: kaścit dveṣī sadā garhāprakaṭanaprīto vigītavastupriyaśca bhavati |
SA16n1276:3348: durjanasahavṛttyā vā vyāpāda utpadyate yathā saunikavyādhādayaḥ |
SA16n1276:3349: mandajñānabalādvā dveṣa utpadyate yathā vṛkṣāṇāṃ śākhopaśākhā vāteritā bhavanti |
SA16n1276:3350: cirasamupacitadveṣānuśayasya āniryātanabhāvaṃ dveṣa utpadyate saunikavyādhasarpāṇāmāgamādvā dveṣa utpadyate |
SA16n1276:3351: paradoṣānusmṛtipremṇā vā dveṣa utpadyata iti yathā navakleśeṣūktam |
SA16n1276:3353: jātyā vā dveṣa utpadyate yathā sarpādīnām |
SA16n1276:3357: ātmabuddhimadhyayasya [tatra] mānaparipoṣaṇaṃ padārthādhyavasānañcetyevamādipratyayeṣu satsu dveṣa utpadyate |
SA16n1276:3359: (u) uktaṃ sūtre-dveṣaḥ kāmarāgād gurutaraṃ pāpam iti |
SA16n1276:3372: sattvāḥ sadā duḥkhinaḥ punardveṣeṇa pīḍitāḥ vraṇe prayuktakṣāravat |
SA16n1276:3373: kiñca sūtre bhagavān svayaṃ dveṣadoṣānāha-dveṣabahulaḥ kutsitaḥ kharvākāro'praśāntabuddhiśayaḥ sadā bhīrucitto janānāmaśraddheya iti |
SA16n1276:3376: bhrukuṭikṣepeṇa durabhigamo'saṃśliṣṭamukhavarṇo durvimokasulabhakopaḥ sadā vyāpādopanāhamudito vigrahabhūṣaṇāyudheṣu prīto durmitrapakṣapātī sajjanavidveṣī,
SA16n1276:3386: (u) yaḥ paragarhādiduḥkhaṃ kṣamate sa kuśaladharmapuṇyaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:3394: yo bhikṣuḥ kṣamāvān sa pravrajyādharmā syāt |
SA16n1276:3397: ya ākāraveṣābhyāṃ bhikṣuḥ bhinnavyavahāro dveṣacittasahagataśca na sa bhavyo bhavati |
SA16n1276:3401: dveṣakārī parān vyābādhituṃ kāmayānaḥ svātmānameva vyābādhate |
SA16n1276:3404: ato jñāyate dveṣo mahāntamātmāpakarṣaṃ karoti iti |
SA16n1276:3405: ataḥ prājñenātmano hitaṃ kartukāmena mahadduḥkhaṃ mahatpāpañcāpākurvatā kṣāntirācaritavyāḥ |
SA16n1276:3407: (u) yo'nityatāṃ bhāvayati bahulīkaroti pratibudhyate sarvadharmā kṣaṇikāḥ,
SA16n1276:3410: śūnyatācittasya samyak bhāvanayā kṣamamāṇa evaṃ cintayati dharmeṣu vatustaḥ śūnyeṣu ko nindakaḥ ko vā nindāvedaka iti |
SA16n1276:3412: ahaṃ satyato doṣavān iti pūrvapuruṣāḥ satyaṃ vadanti,
SA16n1276:3417: aśubhanindāṃ śṛṇvan evaṃ cintayet sarve lokā yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayante |
SA16n1276:3431: mayā śabdasyāsya nimittagrahaṇādeva daurmanasyopāyāsāḥ sambhavanti ityahameva duṣṭaḥ |
SA16n1276:3433: kasmāt dveṣādīni pāpāni na sattvānāṃ doṣāḥ,
SA16n1276:3435: yathā bhūtacikitsako bhūtoccāṭanādhyavasito bhūtameva dviṣati na tu rogiṇam |
SA16n1276:3439: yathā nindāpaṭavo brāhmaṇādayo buddhaṃ vividhaṃ nindanti |
SA16n1276:3442: kiñcedaṃ cintayet lokā akuśabahulā ātmajīvitamahṛtvaiva kaṭukaṃ kurvanti |
SA16n1276:3444: kiñcaivaṃ cintayet- aśubhanindādinā na mama duḥkhamiti vedanā kṣantavyā |
SA16n1276:3445: yathā bhagavān bhikṣūn śāsti-kāye krakaceṇa vidīrṇe'pi vedanā kṣantavyā |
SA16n1276:3448: nindāyāṃ labdhāyāṃ nirvedaṃ bhūyasā mātrayā suniśritamavagamyākuśalamācarati |
SA16n1276:3449: sa jānāti ca nindāyā akṣamā ante duḥkhaṃvipākavedanā ityevaṃ cintayan narake mā bhūt pāta iti gurvīmapi nindāṃ vedayate |
SA16n1276:3450: so'tīva hryapatrapāsāpekṣaḥ cintayati ahaṃ mahāpuruṣasya bhagavataḥ śrāvako mārgabhāvayitā |
SA16n1276:3452: kṣānticāribhirbodhisattvaiḥ śakrādibhiśca labhyaṃ kṣāntibalaṃ śrūyate ca |
SA16n1276:3460: dharmāṇāṃ samavāyaḥ kevalaṃ prajñaptyā puruṣa ityucyate |
SA16n1276:3469: sūtre ca vidyāyā artho vivṛtaḥ-yasya kasyacit jñānaṃ vidyeti |
SA16n1276:3480: avidyā tu vikalpinīti na tarupāṣāṇayoḥ samānā |
SA16n1276:3482: yathā puruṣasya cakṣuṣā rūpādarśanaṃ nādarśanadharmo bhavati |
SA16n1276:3487: pañcaskandheṣu asti pudgala iti mithyākalpanā ghaṭaśakale ca suvarṇasaṃjñotpadyata iti kasmādbhavati |
SA16n1276:3492: (pṛ) na vidyā avidyā iti cet idānīṃ vidyāṃ vihāya sarve dharmā abhāvāḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1276:3498: evamiyaṃ vidyā savikalpā'pi yathābhūtaṃ na prajānātītyavidyetyucyate |
SA16n1276:3510: viparītā vidyā avidyeti-yathā rātrau sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa iti buddhirbhavati |
SA16n1276:3518: arhato buddhadharmeṣu vidyā nāstīti vidyā'vidyā syāt |
SA16n1276:3532: ato jñāyate sarve kleśā avidyā iti |
SA16n1276:3537: ato jñāyate avidyāṅgāni sarve kleśā iti |
SA16n1276:3546: yaduta durmitrasaṃstavo'saddharmaśravaṇaṃ mithyāmanaskāro mithyāsamudācāra ityebhiścaturbhiḥ kāraṇairavidyotpadyate |
SA16n1276:3554: puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā astīti buddheḥ pūrvameva puruṣamanaskāra utpadyate paścānniścaya ityato'vidyetyucyate |
SA16n1276:3564: yathoktaṃ sūtre-avidyānivṛtasya [bhikṣavo vālasya] tṛṣṇāsamprayuktasyaivamayaṃ kāyaḥ samudāgata iti |
SA16n1276:3565: siṃha nādasūtre coktam-upādānāni tṛṣṇānidānānīti | gāthā cāha-
SA16n1276:3569: pṛthagjanā vedayante [sukhata] imān skandhān pañca [ye] 'śucayo'nityā duḥkhāḥ śunyā anātmakāḥ |
SA16n1276:3570: ya āryāḥ te tān duḥkhān vedayante |
SA16n1276:3572: yathoktaṃ sūtre-ātmasaṃjñā mithyāviparyāsa iti prajānato na punarutpadyata iti |
SA16n1276:3577: tathā sattvā api dṛṣṭe'lpāsvādagṛddhā bahūnādīnavān na pratīkṣante |
SA16n1276:3578: tīrthikagranthairutpannamithyādṛṣṭikā vadanti na santi puṇyādīni iti |
SA16n1276:3584: buddho bhagavān sarvajñaḥ śāstā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samyak caryāviśuddha āryavinīta ityādi tīrthikā na vivicya prajānanti |
SA16n1276:3590: yathā kalpādau janā āsvādastuccha ityanabhijñāya [tatra] rāgādhyavasāyamutpādayāmāsuḥ |
SA16n1276:3592: ato jñātavyamavidyayā sarve lābhāḥ pramuṣitā iti |
SA16n1276:3600: yathoktaṃ sūtre-avidyā pāpīyasī gurvī durvimokā ca iti |
SA16n1276:3606: karmaṇāmanupacayādvijñānādīnyaṅgāni na punaḥ prādurbhavanti ato jñāyate avidyā sarvaduḥkhānāṃ mūlamiti |
SA16n1276:3610: yathā ca māyā mūḍhānāṃ puraḥ pradarśayati mṛdaṃ suvarṇamiti |
SA16n1276:3611: prākṛtā mūḍhā dṛṣṭe pāpādhiṣṭhitā abhidhānenollapanīyā bhavanti |
SA16n1276:3612: tathā lokā api cakṣuṣā aśuci dṛṣṭvā tadvañcitā bhavanti |
SA16n1276:3621: susthāne prītivigataḥ sajjanadveṣī durjanasnidgho'bhiprāyasya viparyayagrāhī priyamitre sadā pratikūlaḥ tucchavastuṣu sāragrāhī alpahrayapatrapo na vicikitsāpratīkṣī,
SA16n1276:3622: na pareṣāṃ tarpaṇa ātmanāpi durniṣevaṇo mūḍho'vijñātā sujīrṇamalinavastro bhramati |
SA16n1276:3624: ātmanaivātmānaṃ mahāniti ślāghamānaḥ parasya laghūkaraṇe tṛpyati |
SA16n1276:3628: apariśuddho'nairyāṇiko bhāṣaṇe'paṭuḥ sadā krodhopanāhamuditaḥ paropadeśaṃ viparyayato gṛhītvā [tatra] paramādhyāvasito durlabhamabhyasya suvinaśvaraṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:3636: kasmātsūtra uktam-avidyāyā bhaiṣajyaṃ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādabhāvanā vā iti |
SA16n1276:3650: yathā ghaṭapadaṃ śṛṇvato manasi saṃśaya udeti kiṃ rūpādiḥ ghaṭaḥ kiṃvā rūpādivyatirikto'nyo'sti ghaṭa iti |
SA16n1276:3651: evaṃ pañcaskandhātmakaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ vā tadvyatirikto'nyo'sti puruṣa iti |
SA16n1276:3652: samāhitacittaḥ kāya evātmā kāyādanya ātmā iti śāśvatocchadākhye'ntadvaye na patati |
SA16n1276:3653: yaḥ prajānāti ghaṭaḥ pratītyasamutpanno rūparasagandhasparśamaya iti |
SA16n1276:3658: nāma sarvamadhvabhāvi nāma bhūyo na vidyate |
SA16n1276:3659: ekadharmasya nāmno'sya sarve dharmā vaśānugāḥ || iti |
SA16n1276:3663: api coktam-saṃskārāṇāṃ santatiṃ pañcaskandhānāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ vadanti |
SA16n1276:3665: ukta ñca sūtre-yaḥ pratītyasabhutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1276:3666: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa buddhaṃ paśyatīti |
SA16n1276:3667: evaṃ yo nāmajaṃ saṃśayaṃ prajahāti so'parapratyayaḥ paramārthato buddhaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1276:3670: saṃkṣepata uktaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhe-yā kācana prajñā sarvā sā'vidyāvyāvartinīti |
SA16n1276:3671: avidyā ca sarvakleśānāṃ mūlaṃ sarvakleśānāṃ sahakāriṇī cetyevaṃ pratītyasamutpāda [jñāne] avidyā prahīyate ||
SA16n1276:3694: yathā sthaviraḥ kṣemaka āha-na khalvāyuṣman rūpamasmīti vadāmi,
SA16n1276:3700: api ca ma āyuṣman pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu anusahagato'smīti mānaḥ asmīticchandaḥ asmītyanuśayo'samuddhataḥ |
SA16n1276:3705: (u) dhyānābhyāse'lpāsvādalābhāt saṃyojanā nuśayaṃ vyāvartayati na punaścitte samudācarati |
SA16n1276:3712: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yo bhikṣuḥ kathayati ahaṃ samuddhatavicikitsaḥ pratilabdhamārga iti |
SA16n1276:3713: [tasya] purata evaṃ kathayet-atigabhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādo lokottaradharma iti |
SA16n1276:3717: adhimānini buddhā bhagavanto mahākāruṇikā api [taṃ] dūrīkṛtya na dharmāvavādaṃ kurvanti |
SA16n1276:3722: tathā'yamapi buddhaśāsanārṇavagataḥ alpaṃ dhyānasukhaṃ pratilabhya pāramārthikamārga iti tatrāsaṅgaṃ janayati |
SA16n1276:3723: adhimānī ante maraṇakāle na mārgaṃ vedayate |
SA16n1276:3735: yat sujane pūjye pṛṣṭhato'satkāra uddhatamānaḥ saḥ |
SA16n1276:3739: yathoktaṃsūtre-ye kecit [śramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā] anityena rūpeṇa [duḥkhena vipariṇāmadharmeṇa] śreṣṭho'hamasmīti samanupaśyanti |
SA16n1276:3740: sadṛśo['hamasmāti samanupaśyanti] hīno ['hamasbhīti samanupaśyanti] kimanyatra yathābhūtasyādarśanāt |
SA16n1276:3747: kaḥ prājña imamapekṣya ucco'smīti [manyeta] evamādikāyānusmṛtipratyaye tu nāsti mānaḥ |
SA16n1276:3748: prājño jānāti sarve sattvā yadi vā daridrī yadi vā dhanī yadi vā pūjyo yadi vā jadhanyaḥ sarve'pi asthimāṃsasnāyusirāpañcasandhipeśīkalalasamavāyamayakāyāḥ,
SA16n1276:3751: ābhyantaraṃ bāhyaṃ cittaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaṇikamiti paśyato na bhavati mānaḥ |
SA16n1276:3752: cittasamādhiñca samyak bhāvayato na bhavati mānaḥ |
SA16n1276:3756: kiñca prājñasya śīlādiṣu satsu na bhavati mānaḥ |
SA16n1276:3758: śīlādayo hi sarve eṣāṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayakarāḥ |
SA16n1276:3761: kaḥ prājño'nityena duḥkhena aśucinā padārthena mānaṃ kuryāt |
SA16n1276:3766: na tadā mānalakṣaṇamājñāsiṣam ahamiti vedanāvyākaraṇaṃ kutracidutpatsyata iti |
SA16n1276:3783: anena rāgeṇa labdho gotrādimānastu vipulaṃ vardhate |
SA16n1276:3789: (u) ayaṃ samupāttadhārṣṭyo duḥsahabhāṣaṇo'satkāracitto'lpabhayaḥ svairācāramuditaḥ svayañca mahāduḥśāsano yatkiñcijjadhanya[mapi]svayaṃ bahumānī,
SA16n1276:3795: śāstramāha-vicikitsā nāma tattvārthe buddhyaviniścaḥ kimasti vimuktiḥ kiṃ vā nāsti |
SA16n1276:3799: (pṛ) vṛkṣe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sthāṇuḥ kiṃ vā puruṣa iti |
SA16n1276:3800: mṛtpiṇḍe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mṛtpiṇḍaḥ uta kokila iti |
SA16n1276:3801: madhukare saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ madhukaraḥ kiṃ vā jambūphalamiti |
SA16n1276:3802: sarpe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sarpaḥ kiṃ vā rajjuriti |
SA16n1276:3803: ghoṭakamṛge saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ prabhā kiṃ vā salilaṃ iti |
SA16n1276:3805: dhvanau saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mayūrakṛta uta manuṣyakṛta iti |
SA16n1276:3806: gandhe saṃśayo bhavati kimutpalagandhaḥ uta saṃparkagandha iti |
SA16n1276:3807: rase saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ māṃsarasa uta māṃsābhāsarasa iti |
SA16n1276:3808: sparśe saṃśayo bhavati kimautpattikatantava uta paripakvatantava iti |
SA16n1276:3810: yathā kimayaṃ dharmo dravyavān uta guṇamātram |
SA16n1276:3811: vimastyātmā uta na ityevamādayaḥ kiṃ saṃśayā na santi |
SA16n1276:3813: sthāṇurvā puruṣo va ityevamādibhistu na kleśā bhavanti |
SA16n1276:3814: na ca te punarbhavasya pratyayā bhavanti |
SA16n1276:3819: pūrvaṃ dvidhāvasthitaṃ padārthaṃ sthāṇuṃ puruṣañca dṛṣṭvā paścāddūrataḥ paśyati puruṣādi vastu tadā saṃśeta sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti |
SA16n1276:3824: dvidhājñānam-yadā deve varṣati nadī samṛddhā bhavati |
SA16n1276:3831: adṛśyaṃ vastu yathā vṛkṣamūlaṃ pṛthivyāmadhastāt jala[sthaṃ]vā |
SA16n1276:3832: kiñcidavastu adṛśyañca yathā dvitīyaṃ śiraḥ tṛtīyo bāhuḥ |
SA16n1276:3840: vimate vastuni yāvadviśiṣṭalakṣaṇaṃ na paśyati tāvatsaṃśayo bhavati |
SA16n1276:3846: yathā bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo'vadat vyavasāyena brāhmaṇalabdhaṃ gamīraṃ dharmamabhisametya pratyayān jānan paśyaṃśca prakṣīṇasaṃśayajālo bhaveyamiti |
SA16n1276:3848: yathā jñānī saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ śrutvā vijñāya ca nirdhāsyati saṃsāro'nādirityevamādi |
SA16n1276:3850: (u) vicikitsābahulasya laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ sarvaṃ na sidhyati |
SA16n1276:3852: sandidghaḥ pumān na kāryaṃ karma karoti |
SA16n1276:3861: sa tamaso rāśistrividhaḥ atīto'nāgataḥ pratyutpanna iti |
SA16n1276:3864: vinā bhagavacchāsanaṃ na samyaksamādhimān iti vaktuṃ śakyate |
SA16n1276:3866: tadyathāha-aṣṭakādayaḥ pañcābhijñā maharṣayaḥ saṃśayālīḍhā vipannā iti |
SA16n1276:3867: saṃśayānasya dānādi kurvataḥ puṇyamavipākaṃ vā syādalpavipākaṃ vā |
SA16n1276:3870: tasya puruṣasya cittaṃ sadā vicikitsākaluṣitamityato nāsti kuśalam |
SA16n1276:3871: uktañca sūtre-vicikitsitacitto dānaṃ datvā pratyantabhūmau vipākaṃ vedayata iti |
SA16n1276:3887: na tasmin samaye cittaṃ nirdhārayati ayaṃ sthāṇurayaṃ puruṣa iti |
SA16n1276:3889: mithyādarśanādasti vā nāsti veti vicikitsanna śraddadhate |
SA16n1276:3894: samyadgarśanasambhavā śraddhā dṛḍhā bhavati śravaṇasambhavā tu naivaṃ bhavati ||
SA16n1276:3902: (pṛ) pañcasu skandheṣu ātmeti nāmakaraṇe ko doṣaḥ |
SA16n1276:3912: evaṃ bruvataḥ pañcaskandhā eva nityāḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1276:3914: tathā sati pañcaskandhā eka eva syuḥ |
SA16n1276:3919: ātmīye sati rāgadveṣādayaḥ sarve kleśāḥ samudbhavanti |
SA16n1276:3927: ima ātmakalpanayā kāyaśiraścakṣurhastapādasyaudārikaṃ vivekameva na labhante |
SA16n1276:3933: yathoktaṃ sūtre-pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyānātmatāṃ śrutvā mahābhītimutpādayanti ātmā na bhaviṣyati |
SA16n1276:3935: evaṃ pṛthagjanā yāvatpāmopahataṃ kāyaṃ prārthayamānā na nirvāṇāya prayante |
SA16n1276:3939: tuṣṭa āyuḥkṣaye bhoti rogasyāpagame yathā || iti |
SA16n1276:3940: ātmāstīti yo vadati sa mithyādṛṣṭau patati |
SA16n1276:3941: yadyātmā nityaḥ tadā sukhaduḥkhayorvikāro na syāt |
SA16n1276:3942: asati vikāre nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā |
SA16n1276:3945: svabhāvato vimuktasyāpi nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā |
SA16n1276:3950: yo nairātmyaṃ paśyati tasya yātāyātaṃ samucchidyate |
SA16n1276:3953: (u) martyo devaḥ pumān strī iti nāmanimittaṃ śṛṇvataḥ saṃjñāvikalpādātmabuddhirutpadyate |
SA16n1276:3955: hetvabhāvenātmabuddhirutpadyate yaduta yadyātmā nāsti kaḥ sukhaṃ sukhaṃ vedayet,
SA16n1276:3965: tadyathā andha [kalpa] sya śakalādi labdhvā suvarṇamaṇisaṃjñā bhavati |
SA16n1276:3968: (pṛ) paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ rūpakāye keśanakharomādyavayavān pratyekaṃ vibhinnān |
SA16n1276:4000: vedanādaya ime rūpe pratibaddhā ityata ucyate rūpa[vān] ātmeti |
SA16n1276:4018: tadā eka eva pumān bahvātmā syāt |
SA16n1276:4019: rūpādīnāṃ saviśeṣatvāt vaktuṃ śakyaṃ rūpamevā na vedanādaya iti |
SA16n1276:4026: lokasatyato'styātmā paramārthato nāstyātmeti vacanaṃ samyak dṛṣṭiḥ |
SA16n1276:4027: paramārthato nāsti saṃvṛtito'stīti vadan na dṛṣṭau patati |
SA16n1276:4029: yathā vyāghrī svapotaṃ mukhenāpaharati atiniṣṭhuragrahaṇe kṣataṃ [bhavediti] atiśithilagrahaṇe bhraṃśo [bhavediti] |
SA16n1276:4036: paramārthato nāstīti vadan saṃvṛtito'stīti ca vadan antadvayaṃ parityajya madhyamāyāṃ pratipadi caratītyākhyāyate |
SA16n1276:4043: (pṛ) yo dharmaḥ paramārthato nāsti sa sutarāṃ nāstīti syāt |
SA16n1276:4045: (u) sarvairlaukikairvyavahriyate astīti yaduta karma karmavipāko yadi vā bandho yadi vā mokṣa iti |
SA16n1276:4048: ime pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā māyopamāḥ jvālāvacca santānenotpannatvāt |
SA16n1276:4051: tadā pṛthagjanā vyāmuhya yadi vā ucchedavāde pateyuḥ yadi vā skandhānāṃ nāstītākathane avineyāḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1276:4052: puṇyapāpādikarmabhirbandho vā mokṣo vā na sidhyet |
SA16n1276:4061: saṃvṛtyā'stīti kathane na tadā punaḥ paramārthato nāstīti vacanamapekṣyate |
SA16n1276:4062: uktañca sūtre-yaḥ sarvadharmān niḥsvabhāvān prajānāti sa śūnyatāyāmavatarati |
SA16n1276:4064: ato jñāyate pañca skandhā api na santīti |
SA16n1276:4067: mahāśūnyatāsūtra uktam-yadidaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti vacanaṃ yadi vāyaṃ puruṣo jarāmaraṇa [-lakṣaṇa] iti vacanaṃ |
SA16n1276:4068: yadi vā tīrthikānāṃ vacanaṃ kāya eva jīvaḥ,
SA16n1276:4071: kāya eva jīvaḥ anyaḥ kāyo'nyo jīva itīdaṃ vacane na brahmacaryaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1276:4072: yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ayaṃ puruṣo jarāmaraṇa[lakṣaṇa] iti nairātmyasyābhidhānam |
SA16n1276:4073: yaḥ pratiṣedha idaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti tat jarāmaraṇasya vyāvartanam |
SA16n1276:4078: kiñcoktaṃ rādhasūtre-rūpaṃ rādha yūyaṃ vikirata vidhamata vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta [tṛṣṇā] kṣayāya [pratipadyata] tadyathā pāṃsvāgārikāḥ |
SA16n1276:4085: yadā tu mahāvāte opūyate jalena vā pravāhitaḥ tadā vṛkṣasaṃjñā nirudhyate |
SA16n1276:4086: evaṃ yadā vidhvaṃsitāni vikrīḍanakaṃ kṛtāni vikīrṇāni vidhmātāni niruddhāni pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni,
SA16n1276:4088: yathāha sūtram-rādha yūyaṃ [rūpaṃ] vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta vikirata vidhamata bhāgaśo vidalayata sattvakṣayāya iti |
SA16n1276:4089: asmin sūtra uktam-pañcaskandhā anityāḥ sattvaśūnyāḥ na santīti |
SA16n1276:4090: pūrvasmin sūtra uktam-pañcaskandhā vikīrṇā niruddhāḥ te dharmaśūnyā bhavanti iti ||
SA16n1276:4093: dharmāḥ samucchidyante vā śāśvatā vā iti yadidaṃ vacanaṃ tadanta[graha] dṛṣṭirityucyate |
SA16n1276:4094: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ-yadā kaścidāha ātmā śāśvato vā aśāśvato veti iyamevāntagrahadṛṣṭiḥ na sarve dharmāḥ[śāśvatā vā aśāśvatā vā] iti |
SA16n1276:4096: dṛṣṭaṃ khalu pratyakṣaṃ [yat] bāhyaṃ vastu samucchidyata iti |
SA16n1276:4103: asti ca nāsti ca karma paraṃ maraṇādityatra yadastīti sa śāśvata[vādaḥ] yannāstīti sa ucchedavādaḥ |
SA16n1276:4105: (pṛ) ayaṃ caturtho graho na dṛṣṭiḥ syāt |
SA16n1276:4108: uktañca sūtre-ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni nirudhyante santyanyānīti śāśvatavādaḥ |
SA16n1276:4110: ātmā pūrvamakarot paścātkariṣyatīti yaddarśanaṃ sā śāśvatadṛṣṭiḥ ātmā pūrvaṃ nākarot paścānna kariṣyatītīyamucchedadṛṣṭiḥ |
SA16n1276:4111: api cāha mithyādṛṣṭisūtram-puruṣasya saptakāyāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyavaḥ sukhaṃduḥkhaṃ jīvitamiti |
SA16n1276:4113: kiñcāha-kṣureṇa ca krakacena prāṇino hatvā [eka] māṃsapuṃñca kuryāt nāsti [tato nidānaṃ]pāpaṃ [nāsti pāpasyāgama] iti |
SA16n1276:4116: asti paralokaḥ yaḥ kārakaḥ sa eva vedaka iti yadvacanam |
SA16n1276:4119: (u) yena hetunā bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi vadanti tato nidānaṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭirbhavati |
SA16n1276:4120: yena hetunā na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi vadanti tato nidānamucchedadṛṣṭirbhavati |
SA16n1276:4128: kathaṃ vaktavyaṃ [yathā] kṣīṇāsravo'rhan kāyasya bhedā [ducchetsyati vinaṃkṣyati] na bhavati paraṃ maraṇāditi |
SA16n1276:4140: ato jñāyate nocchedo na śāśvata iti |
SA16n1276:4141: kāyādanya upalabhyata ityato naikaḥ kāyena bhavati |
SA16n1276:4143: pañcaskandhāḥ punaḥ santanyanta ityataḥ sattvo jāyate mriyata iti vaktameva na prabhavati |
SA16n1276:4144: santānena pravṛttatvādanya iti na vaktuṃ śakyate |
SA16n1276:4146: ime skandhāste skandhāścānya ityabhidhānāt śāśvatavādo na bhavati |
SA16n1276:4147: svasantānapratyayabalena pravartata ityata ucchedavādo na bhavati |
SA16n1276:4150: vastutaḥ satsu dharmeṣu nāstīti cittotpādanaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ |
SA16n1276:4151: yathā vadanti na santi catussatyāni trīṇi ratnānītyādi |
SA16n1276:4159: na santi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ samyaggatāḥ samyak pratipannā ya imaṃ lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtya pravedayanti-kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamitthatvāya iti |
SA16n1276:4161: iṣṭhaṃ iti vedokto devānāṃ kṛte yāgaḥ |
SA16n1276:4165: sukṛtaduṣkṛtakarmaṇāṃ[phalaṃ] vipākaḥ ihalokaśubhāśubhakīrtyādiḥ devakāyādayaḥ pāralauke vipākaśca |
SA16n1276:4185: abhidharme yāḥ pañcadṛṣṭayaḥ brahmajālasūtre ca dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ sarvā [stā] mithyādṛṣṭayo bhavati |
SA16n1276:4192: laukikāḥ padārthā ahetukā apratyayā iti yadvadanti |
SA16n1276:4193: yadi vā vadanti īśvarādihetukā na tṛṣṇāhetukā iti |
SA16n1276:4204: atha vā manyante buddhaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ pūjyo nāsti puruṣa ityato nāsti [sa] buddha iti draṣṭavyam |
SA16n1276:4206: samyakcaryayā taddharmapratilābhino na santītyato nāsti saṅghaḥ |
SA16n1276:4211: kṛpaṇastu dhanika ityādibhiḥ nāsti kāraṇairvadanti dattamiti |
SA16n1276:4217: yadi jīvo nityaḥ tadā nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtam |
SA16n1276:4219: nāsti paro loka ityato nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ,
SA16n1276:4224: maraṇātparaṃ na bhavati pratītyasamutpāda ityato vadanti nāsti paro loka iti |
SA16n1276:4231: dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt mātā pitā ca kiṃ karoti |
SA16n1276:4237: tadā cakṣuṣā paridṛśyamāno'yaṃ kāyaḥ khanyamāno mṛdbhavati |
SA16n1276:4241: akāyātmaka ityayaṃ dvividho yadi cittātmako yadi vā cittavyatirikta iti |
SA16n1276:4251: sa kṣudhitaḥ sarvān dṛṣṭvā annaṃ prārthayate |
SA16n1276:4264: paśyāmaḥ khalu sarve sattvāḥ prajñaptikāraṇakā iti |
SA16n1276:4266: paśyāmaśca sarvān sattvān karmakāraṇatantrān na svatantrān |
SA16n1276:4267: ato vadanti nāsti balaṃ nāsti vīryaṃ [nāsti] ca tatphalamiti |
SA16n1276:4271: vadanti ca dharmā nirudhyamānāḥ punaḥ paramāṇavo bhavantīti |
SA16n1276:4286: asti punaḥ sattvo yena śucīkriyata iti |
SA16n1276:4289: skandhānāṃ santānena pravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā ekalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti |
SA16n1276:4295: brahmā svayamāha-ahamasmi mahābrahmā prabhurdevānāṃ kartā jagata ityevamādi |
SA16n1276:4296: kecidāhuḥ-yadi kaścitpañcakāmānāṃ sukhavedanāsampannaḥ ayamutkṛṣṭa dharma iti |
SA16n1276:4297: kecitpunarāhuḥ -yadi kaścidviraktaḥ prathamadhyāna[mārabhya] yāvaccaturthadhyānamupasampadya viharati ayamutkṛṣṭa dharma iti |
SA16n1276:4304: buddhavacanañca na cāṭukāvya [vat] kleśagurukaṃ na vedasadṛśam |
SA16n1276:4311: śīladhāraṇa brahmacaryamātra āsajya devapūjādayaśca [vyavadānamārga ākhyāyeta] īśvara [prasādena] ca viśuddhiṃ labhata iti ca vadanti |
SA16n1276:4314: punaḥ prayataḥ snātvā brahmayajñapaṭhanatadūrdhvabhojanaṃ viśuddhimārga iti |
SA16n1276:4317: yat dharmā lokasatyataḥ santo'pi abhāva ityucyante |
SA16n1276:4318: abhāve bhāvasaṃjñeti yaducyate santi dravyāṇi astyavayavīti |
SA16n1276:4334: (u) sarve doṣā vipattivyasanāni ca mithyādṛṣṭyā bhavanti |
SA16n1276:4335: sa āha-nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ phalaṃ vipāka iti |
SA16n1276:4336: ato dṛṣṭadharma eva na santi suvṛttāni |
SA16n1276:4341: sa mithyādṛṣṭikaḥ puruṣaḥ lokadūṣakaḥ satvānāṃ bhūyasāpakārāya pravartate |
SA16n1276:4343: tena kṛtaṃ kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ karma sarvamaśubhavipākāya bhavati |
SA16n1276:4344: yathoktaṃ sūtre-mithyādṛṣṭikasya [bhikṣavaḥ] puruṣapudgalasya yatkāyakarma yathādṛṣṭisamāttaṃ samādattaṃ yacca vākkarma........yacca manaḥkarma yā cetanā yā prārthanā yaḥ praṇidhiḥ ye ca saṃskārāḥ sarve te'niṣṭāya akāntāya amanāpāya ahitāya duḥkhāya saṃvartate |
SA16n1276:4345: tadyathā tiktakālābubījaṃ koṣātakībījaṃ picumandabījamādrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikṣiptaṃ yaccaiva pṛthivīrasamupādīyate yaccāporasaṃ tejorasaṃ vāyurasamupādīyate sarvaṃ tat tiktakatvāya kaṭukatvāya asātatvāya saṃvartate |
SA16n1276:4347: evameva mithyādṛṣṭikasya puruṣapudgalasya cittacaitasikā dharmā aniṣṭāya [akāntāya amanāpāya ahitāya duḥkhāya] saṃvartate |
SA16n1276:4349: atastasya puruṣapudgalasya kṛtamapi dānādi neṣṭaphalaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1276:4354: asya puruṣapudgalasya nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtamityato na yataḥ kutaścitprativiratiḥ |
SA16n1276:4357: yaśca vadati nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ veti sa sadā citte'kuśalameva kāṅkṣate |
SA16n1276:4367: tathā ca pudgalo madhyamadeśa utpanna iṣṭāniṣṭavivekāya ṣaḍindriyasampanno'pi na mārgapratilābhapravaṇo bhavati |
SA16n1276:4372: yathā karmavarge narakavimocakaṃ karma ityanena kāraṇena tatpuruṣakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ narakāya saṃvartate |
SA16n1276:4373: na ca sa pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṣapayati |
SA16n1276:4377: samucchinnakuśalamūlasya hi yadā kuśalaṃ na pravartate tadanantaraṃ narakānnaiva vimuktiḥ |
SA16n1276:4378: citte mithyādṛṣṭikatvāt tasya kuśalamūlaṃ kathaṃ pravarteta |
SA16n1276:4386: abhūtavastuni idameva satyamanyanmithyeti vacanaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśa ityucyate |
SA16n1276:4389: (u) sa puruṣo nyūnaguṇaṃ labdhvā ātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate |
SA16n1276:4397: yathāndho ghaṭaśakale suvarṇasaṃjñāmutpādya cakṣuṣmatāṃ laghu hāsyo bhavati |
SA16n1276:4399: yat kaścit bodhimupekṣamāṇaḥ snānādiśīlena viśuddhiprāptiṃ kāṅkṣate tat śīlavrataparāmarśa ityucyate |
SA16n1276:4404: (u) ye doṣā uktā dṛṣṭiparāmarśasya “nyūnaṃ vastu [labdhvā] sampūrṇaṃ manyate ityādinā ta eva doṣāḥ |
SA16n1276:4409: yathoktaṃ sūtre-govratikaḥ saṃsiddha[vrata]ḥ [kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇāt] gavāṃ sahavyatāmupapadyate |
SA16n1276:4422: kasmāt ya ādito nācarati tasya mārgacaraṇaṃ sukaram |
SA16n1276:4424: śatrurapi na tathā pudgalaṃ glapayati yathā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ |
SA16n1276:4426: na hi śatrustathā pudgalaṃ paribhāvayati yathā mithyādṛṣṭayanugāmināṃ tīrthikācaritānāṃ nānāduḥśīlānāṃ nagnatānirlajjatābhasmarajaḥkāyatākeśolluñcchanādīnāṃ samādānam |
SA16n1276:4430: sukhaṃ prārthayitvā duḥkhaṃ labhamāno vimuktiṃ prārthayitvā bandhaṃ labhamānaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ na mattaḥ |
SA16n1276:4433: tasya puruṣasya mithyācāracāritvāt dānāya kāyajīvite satyapi na kiñcana hitaṃ bhavati ||
SA16n1276:4446: yadasantaṃ guṇaṃ khyāpayati tena janā vadanti astīti |
SA16n1276:4448: lābhasatkārāyādbhutaṃ prakhyāpya pareṣāṃ manaḥprahlādinī vāk lapanā |
SA16n1276:4449: paradravyalipsayā tallipsāmupagūhya vadati idaṃ vastu sundaramityādi |
SA16n1276:4451: yadetatpuruṣanindāyai anyaṃ stauti-tava pitā vyavasāyī tvantu neti |
SA16n1276:4453: yat dānena dānaṃ prārthayamāno vadati-idaṃ dānavastu amukātpatyantāllabdhamityādi |
SA16n1276:4455: yat puruṣasya nidrāvyādhau niratiḥ sā tandrītyucyate |
SA16n1276:4457: yat puruṣasya kāyasya jṛmbhaṇā adamanaṃ styānamiddhasya pratyayaḥ sā vijṛmbhikā |
SA16n1276:4462: yo mahāmātrāṇāṃ vacanaṃ na satkaroti na bibheti |
SA16n1276:4475: trayaḥ kleśā sāvānāṃ cetasi bhūyasā vartante |
SA16n1276:4477: sarveṣāmavītarāgāṇāṃ maśakapipīlikāparyantānāmime trayaḥ kleśā eva cittavartinaḥ |
SA16n1276:4483: yasya nāsti mohaḥ na tasya rāgadveṣau |
SA16n1276:4486: santi ca tisra eva vedanā na punarasti caturthī |
SA16n1276:4487: āsu tisṛṣu vedanāsu trayaḥ kleśā anuśayā bhavanti |
SA16n1276:4501: tadā [khalvasya] tatra bhavati nirvāṇasaṃjñā vā vimuktisaṃjñā vā aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā vā ātmasaṃjñā vā |
SA16n1276:4503: (pṛ) anuśayāḥ kiṃ dharme'nuśerate ki vā sattve'nuśerate |
SA16n1276:4525: ayamanuśayo yadi prahīṇo yadi vā'prahīṇaḥ sa ālambanataḥ saṃprayogataśca |
SA16n1276:4530: ato jñāyate sattvamātre'nuśayo na dharma iti |
SA16n1276:4541: sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo'nuśaya iti sūtroktaṃ virudhyeta |
SA16n1276:4543: vaktavyaṃ khalu sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ samutpanno rāgaḥ sattve'nuśeta iti |
SA16n1276:4546: (u) saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaprītyādinā rāga utpadyate na tu rūpādimātrāt |
SA16n1276:4548: yathā vadanti-sukhī na prārthayate duḥkhī tu bahu prārthayate |
SA16n1276:4551: duḥkhasya pīḍanātmakatvāt puruṣasya sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāmeva rāga utpadyate |
SA16n1276:4554: (u) aduḥkhāsukhavedanāḥ sukha[rūpa] tvāt [tatra] puruṣasya rāga utpadyate |
SA16n1276:4555: ata ucyate sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya iti |
SA16n1276:4556: tāsu triṣu vedanāsu trayaḥ kleśā anuśayā ityatastraya evocyante ||
SA16n1276:4561: (u) kāmadhātāvavidyāṃ varjayitvā anye sarve kleśāḥ kāmāsravā ityucyante |
SA16n1276:4569: (u) vastuta āsravā dvividhāḥ satyadarśanaheyā [ye] āsravāṇāṃ mūlabhūtāḥ |
SA16n1276:4578: (pṛ) catvāra oghāḥ kāmaugho bhavaugho dṛṣṭyodho'vidyaugha iti |
SA16n1276:4580: (u) dṛṣṭimavidyāñca varjayitvā tadanye kāmadhātukakleśāḥ sarve kāmaugha ityucyate |
SA16n1276:4597: kiñcittīkṣṇendriya evaṃ cintayati-yadi jīvo nityaḥ tadā aduḥkhasukhavikāraḥ,
SA16n1276:4600: (pṛ) catvāro granthāḥ abhidhyākāyagrantho vyāpādaḥ kāyagranthaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ kāyagranthaḥ idaṃ satyābhiniveśaḥ kāyagrantha iti |
SA16n1276:4606: yaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśakaḥ kāmayate anena śīlavratena viśuddhiṃ labheya iti |
SA16n1276:4611: catvāra ime granthā avaśyaṃ kāyavāṅmayā iti kāyagrantha ityucyante |
SA16n1276:4612: kecidāhuḥ-catvāra ime dharmā jananamaraṇe saṅgra'thnantīti granthāḥ |
SA16n1276:4613: (pṛ) pañca nīvaraṇāni-kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhaṃ auddhatyakukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ceti |
SA16n1276:4617: īrṣyādayaḥ kleśāḥ kaśāśastrādiduścaritāni ca kāmacchandādutpadyante iti |
SA16n1276:4619: styānamiddhena kiñcidviśramya punā rāgadveṣavikṣiptacitto na dhyānasamādhiṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:4621: aśuddhakarmakasya puruṣasya citte sadā daurmanasyakaukṛtyaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1276:4628: kecit teṣāṃ nīvaraṇānāṃ varjanāya vadanti- idaṃ kuśalamidamakuśalamiti |
SA16n1276:4629: sa tatra vicikitsate kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti |
SA16n1276:4631: eṣu pañcasu nīvaraṇeṣu trīṇi dṛḍhabalānīti kevalaṃ nīvaraṇamityucyante |
SA16n1276:4632: anye dve nīvaraṇe tanubale iti dvau dharmau sāṃsargikau |
SA16n1276:4633: ime dve nīvaraṇe jananakāraṇasahite ityataḥ sāṃsargike ityucyeta |
SA16n1276:4648: pañcāvarabhāgīyeṣu saṃyojaneṣu kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ śīlabrataparāmarśaḥ avaragamanārthatvādavarabhāgīyāni |
SA16n1276:4649: tadyathā govratikaḥ saṃsiddhaḥ kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇāt gavāṃ sahavyatāmupapadyate |
SA16n1276:4667: tāni śaikṣajanānāṃ citta ucyante na pṛthagjanānām |
SA16n1276:4668: (pṛ) auddhatyaṃ kasmāt rūpārūpyadhātukaṃ saṃyojanaṃ na kāmadhātukam |
SA16n1276:4672: keṣāñcit rūpe ārūpye ca vimuktisaṃjñā bhavati |
SA16n1276:4681: lābhamātsaryamiti-ahamevātra dānaṃ lapsya mānyebhyaḥ prayacchatu iti |
SA16n1276:4694: kaḥ punarvādaḥ svīyān pañca skandhān tyajatīti |
SA16n1276:4699: mātsaryacittena dātarguṇaṃ pratigrahīturdeyañca samucchedayatītyato gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate |
SA16n1276:4701: tadyathā jātyandhasya sapatnabahulānāñca janma na svātantrayaprāpakam |
SA16n1276:4703: triṣu adhvasu daśasu dikṣu [gatānāṃ] buddhānāṃ śatruḥ san saṃsāre saṃsaran sadā mūḍho bhavati |
SA16n1276:4713: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santyāvāsamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ-anāgatasya subhikṣorāgamanāya necchati |
SA16n1276:4725: varṇamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ-anyeṣāṃ varṇaṃ śrutvā vyākulakaṣāyacitto bhavati |
SA16n1276:4729: sarveṣāṃ mātsaryāṇāṃ sāmānyata ime doṣāḥ santi-prabhūtadhanasañcayaḥ |
SA16n1276:4735: pañca cetaḥ khilāḥ-[ihāyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ] śāstari vicikitsate,
SA16n1276:4742: śāstari vicikitsaka evaṃ cintayati-kiṃ śāstā mahān,
SA16n1276:4744: dharme vicikitsaka [evaṃ cintayati] kiṃ śāstuḥ pravacanamutkṛṣṭamuta vedasyeti |
SA16n1276:4747: śikṣāyāṃ vicikitsate kiṃ mānapānādi dharmo nirvāṇaṃ gamayati uta neti |
SA16n1276:4748: anāttamanā āhata [citto] vyāpādabuddhyā bhayagauravacittaṃ vinā sajjanān garhayati |
SA16n1276:4755: sa ca bālo mūḍho'jño na tathāgatadharmānyadharmayorvivekaṃ prajānāti |
SA16n1276:4760: na ca vedadīn granthān śṛṇoti adhyeti vā |
SA16n1276:4762: adhvanyadhvani bahulamithyāvicikitsaḥ sadā kaluṣitacittatayā śāstrādau vicikitsate |
SA16n1276:4764: sa ca mithyādṛṣṭibahulaiḥ puruṣaiḥ samānakṛtyatayā vicikitsate |
SA16n1276:4765: kiñca vedavyākaraṇādīni mithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇyadhīyānaḥ paribhinnasamyakprajño bhavati ityato vicikitsate |
SA16n1276:4766: dharmāṇāṃ [yathāśrute]'rthe prītaḥ kusmṛtiṃ janayan na sūtrakṛdāśayaṃ labdhuṃ śaknoti |
SA16n1276:4767: ato vicikitsate sarvadā svahitālābhapratyayataḥ śāstrādiṣu vicikitsate |
SA16n1276:4768: pañca cetaso vinibandhāḥ-yaḥ kāyo'vigatarāgo sa kāya āsajyate |
SA16n1276:4776: abhilāṣāvyākulatayā āryavacane upaśamapradarśane dharme na prahṛṣyati |
SA16n1276:4777: ataḥ śīlabāhuśrutyadhyānasamādhyādiṣvalpaṃ hitaṃ vastu labdhvā tenātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate |
SA16n1276:4780: ayaṃ yadyaṣṭākṣaṇavihīnaḥ [saḥ] puruṣakāyaṃ duṣkaraṃ labdhvavānityataścittaikāgryeṇa vīryamārabheta |
SA16n1276:4782: asya samagrasya pratyayasya vigame'nye pratyayā bhavanti |
SA16n1276:4792: (u) sūtra uktaṃ-pṛthagjano viṃśatidhā svacittaṃ nigṛhyaivaṃ cintayet-mama vibhinnākāraveṣamātrasya vṛthā,
SA16n1276:4810: naivāsti sukhalayaḥ kṛtayoḥ kuśalākuśalayornaiva vismṛtirvināśo vā āmaraṇaṃ na dānto bhaviṣyāmi iti |
SA16n1276:4829: evaṃ krameṇa santatyā vardhata ityanuśaya ityucyate |
SA16n1276:4830: (pṛ) ayamanuśayaḥ kiṃ cittasamprayuktaḥ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktaḥ |
SA16n1276:4836: saumanasyamidaṃ yadi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ vartate [tadā] rāgānuśaya ityucyate |
SA16n1276:4851: tathā nocet āryamārgeṇa kasya samucchedaḥ syāt |
SA16n1276:4853: pṛthagjanāḥ śaikṣajanāśca yadā kuśalacitte'vyākṛtacitte ca vartante |
SA16n1276:4870: yathā ca caturdinajvarārto dinadvaye [jvarā]nudbhave'pi jvarārta ityucyate |
SA16n1276:4875: yaducyate bhavatā nāsti cetanā nāsti vikalpaḥ vijñānasyamālambanamasti iti |
SA16n1276:4877: yadāha bhavān- satkāyadṛṣṭiranuśayena saha samucchidyata iti |
SA16n1276:4890: yathā kaścinmāsavarjanadharmamasamādāno māṃsamabhuñjannapi na varjitamāṃsa ityucyate |
SA16n1276:4905: mithyājīvo [yena] māyāśāṭhyādayaḥ pañcadharmāḥ puṣṭiṃ labhante sa mithyājīvaḥ |
SA16n1276:4909: vinaye yatpratiṣiddhaṃ tena ca svātmajīvanaṃ mithyājīvaḥ |
SA16n1276:4917: mārgāvacara evaṃ cintayet-bhagavataḥ śāsane'vatāro mārgācaraṇārthaḥ na jīvanārtha iti |
SA16n1276:4929: evaṃ cintayati-ahamanena śīlena svarga utpatsya iti |
SA16n1276:4947: śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ sthūladarśana ityato bahūnāṃ satvānāṃ gocaraḥ |
SA16n1276:4963: anena kāraṇena ca daridrāṇāṃ nīcānāṃ kutsitānāmatejasvināñca sthāne patanti |
SA16n1276:4978: yathā kasyacitsvata utkṛṣṭavastulābhinaṃ putrameva paśyataścittaṃ duṣprītikaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1276:4987: (pṛ) daśakleśamahābhūmikadharmāḥ tadyathā aśrāddhayaṃ kausīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā vikṣepo'vidyā'samprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśca |
SA16n1276:4998: ato jñāyate na sarvakleśacitteṣu te daśa dharmāḥ santīti |
SA16n1276:5009: sūtra uktam-mahābrahmā brahmakāyikānāmantryāha mā bhavanto śramaṇaṃ gautamamupasaṅkramantu |
SA16n1276:5013: uktañca sūtre-[atha khalu kevadhaṃ] mahābrahmā taṃ bhikṣuṃ bāhau gṛhītvā ekamantamapanayitvā taṃ bhikṣumetadavocat-ahamapi na jānāmi yatremāni catvāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣāṇi nirudhyante iti |
SA16n1276:5018: īdṛśānāṃ pāpakānāṃ kleśānāṃ sattvāt jñātavyamasti ca [tatrā] akuśalamiti |
SA16n1276:5019: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ-mātāpitrupādhyāyācāryādiṣu yo rāgaḥ sa kuśalarāgaḥ |
SA16n1276:5026: yanmānaṃ niśritya mānaṃ samucchedayati ayaṃ kuśalamānaḥ |
SA16n1276:5046: varaṃ saṃśaya eva pātayati na mithyādṛṣṭāvatārayati |
SA16n1276:5059: ato jñāyate tṛṣṇayā sarve bhavasantānāṃ bhavantīti |
SA16n1276:5069: (u) ime sarve dvidhā'pi bhavanti satyadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśceti |
SA16n1276:5070: kenedaṃ jñāyate yathā nāthaputrādayo bhagavacchrāvakān satkāralā bhino dṛṣṭvā īrṣyācittamutpādayamāsuḥ |
SA16n1276:5076: yathā strotaāpannasya narakapatanapratyayaḥ aṣṭamaloke kāyavedakamāyā ca satyadarśanaheyā'pi |
SA16n1276:5077: (pṛ) kleśeṣu kati duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kati samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ |
SA16n1276:5078: (u) pūrvoktāḥ satyadarśanaheyāḥ ṣaḍanuśayāścaturdhā bhavanti duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ |
SA16n1276:5094: yogī samudayasambhūtaṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ucchedadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvartayati |
SA16n1276:5110: (pṛ) rāgo māno mithyādṛṣṭiṃ varjayitvā anyāścatasro dṛṣṭayo duḥkhadaurmanasyendriye varjayitvā [tadanya] trividhendriyasamprayuktāḥ |
SA16n1276:5117: paścādapi vakṣyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu nāsti kleśa iti |
SA16n1276:5119: mātsaryantu na tathā ityatra nāsti hetuḥ |
SA16n1276:5121: evaṃ māno na daurmanasyendriyasamprayukta ityatrāpi nāsti hetuḥ |
SA16n1276:5124: samudayasatya[darśana]heyāśca mithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitsā rāgapratighamānaviprayuktāvidyāśca ime sarvatragānuśayā anye'sarvatragānuśayāḥ |
SA16n1276:5144: yathā kāmadhātukakleśārūpadhātvālambanāḥ tathā rūpadhātukādṛṣṭayādayaḥ kleśā api kāmadhātvālambanāḥ |
SA16n1276:5148: rāgaḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇālambano'pi caturo devān tadadhastanāṃśca saṃkleśayati |
SA16n1276:5156: uktaṃ hi sūtre-īdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭimutpādya īdṛśaṃ vastu vadati yadasti jīva ityādi |
SA16n1276:5162: tathā no cet satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo'pi pañcasu vijñāneṣu varteran |
SA16n1276:5164: cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati ahaṃ paśyamīti |
SA16n1276:5167: kathamucyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu na kleśāḥ santīti |
SA16n1276:5171: manovijñāne hi vidyamānaṃ vikalpakāraṇaṃ na pañcasu vijñāneṣu |
SA16n1276:5172: ato jñāyate pañca vijñāneṣu na santi kleśā iti ||
SA16n1276:5175: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ-kleśā navavidhā-adhamamadhyamottamā adhamādhamādhamamadhyamādhamottamā madhyamādhama madhyamamadhyamamadhyamottamā uttamādhamottamamadhyamottamottamā iti |
SA16n1276:5184: sūtre bhagavānāha-tadyathā dakṣaḥ karmakaro hastena paraśumādāya cakṣuṣā muṣṭipradeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā yānyaṃśasahasrāni pratidinaṃ kṣīyamāṇāni tānyagaṇayanannapi kṣīṇamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā prajānāti idaṃ kṣīṇamiti |
SA16n1276:5185: tathā sa bhikṣurapi mārgacaryāṃ bhāvayan kānyadya kṣīṇāṇyāsravasahasrāṇi kāni hyaḥ kṣīṇānyāsravahasrāṇīti agaṇayannapi kṣīṇamātre prajānāti kṣīṇa āsrava iti |
SA16n1276:5186: ato jñāyate'pramāṇai jñānaiḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta natvaṣṭha nava vā iti |
SA16n1276:5187: (pṛ) kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya kaḥ kleśa prahīyate |
SA16n1276:5189: yathoktaṃ sūtre bhagavatā-prathamadhyānamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣayo yāvadākiñcanyāyatanamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣaya iti |
SA16n1276:5190: tāni saptapratiśaraṇāni vinā'pi āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ karoti |
SA16n1276:5192: ato jñāyate kāmadhātukasamādhiṃ niśrityāpi āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhata iti |
SA16n1276:5197: (pṛ) pūrvaṃ prathamadhyānādvītarāgaḥ kiṃ krameṇa dvitīyadhyānādīn prāpnoti kiṃ vā ekakālameva |
SA16n1276:5202: yathā ca yāmyā devāḥ pariṣvaṅge kāmaṃ sādhayanti |
SA16n1276:5203: tuṣitā devāḥ pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti |
SA16n1276:5205: paranirmitavaśavartino devā ākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti |
SA16n1276:5216: (u) yathā satyadarśanaheyāḥ sarve kleśā nirodhasatyadarśanena prahīyante |
SA16n1276:5217: uktapūrvamidam yat nirodhadarśanapraheyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭyādayaḥ kleśāḥ sarve nirodhasatyadarśanena prahīyante |
SA16n1276:5218: ūṣmadharmādārabhya anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni bhāvayitvā ādau praheyāḥ kleśā nirodhadarśanena kṣīyante |
SA16n1276:5227: (pṛ) [nanu] sūtra uktam-pañcaskandhānanityādinā bhāvayitvā strotaāpattipalaṃ yāvadarhatphalaṃ vindate iti |
SA16n1276:5233: ayaṃ rūpanirodha iti sarvadā mama paśyato dharmaṃ vijānataḥ kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti |
SA16n1276:5238: ato jñāyate skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyataḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti |
SA16n1276:5245: ato jñāyate'saṃskṛtālambano mārga eva kleśān prajahātīti |
SA16n1276:5261: yat satvā viśuddhaṃ paramaṃ nirvāṇasukhamupekṣante pratyutātitucchaṃ kāmasukhaṃ bhavasukhaṃ kāmayante tadidaṃ sarvaṃ kleśānāṃ doṣaḥ |
SA16n1276:5262: yadā kleśān prajahāti tadā mahāhitaṃ pratilabhante |
SA16n1276:5291: yathoktaṃ bhagavatāsūtre-yaḥ pratilabdhavidyaḥ sanyastāvidyaḥ sa kiṃ pāpakaṃ karma puṇyaṃ karma āneñjyañca karma karoti na vā |
SA16n1276:5294: ato jñāyate prajñaptyanuyāyī kevalaṃ karmāṇi karotīti |
SA16n1276:5295: anāsravaṃ cittaṃ na prajñaptimavalambata iti na karmāṇi karoti |
SA16n1276:5301: anāsravaṃ cittañca na caryālakṣaṇamityato nāstyanāsravaṃ karma |
SA16n1276:5304: ato jñāyate vidyamānaḥ kāyaḥ kleśahetu[ka] iti |
SA16n1276:5309: kleśavāneva [jāyate] yatra bhavalakṣaṇaṃ kvarodanādi jananakāle pratyakṣamasti |
SA16n1276:5310: ato jñāyate kleśaiḥ sahaiva sarve jāyanta iti |
SA16n1276:5311: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā bahavo varcaḥkuṭyādiṣu prasūyante na tu śilādiṣu |
SA16n1276:5318: mriyamāṇā dūrato narakaṃ dṛṣṭvā idaṃ padmasara iti tadāsaṅgāttatrotpadyante |
SA16n1276:5319: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yo nibiḍitasthāne vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labheyamiti mriyate sa pakṣiṣūtpadyate |
SA16n1276:5321: yaḥ śītārto mriyate sa tapananarake jāyate |
SA16n1276:5324: ya āhārāsaktaḥ sa kuṇapeṣu kīṭo jāyate |
SA16n1276:5338: muhūrtaṃ daṇḍe viramatyapi [cakram] bhramatyeva na tu śāmyati |
SA16n1276:5345: evaṃ jñānāgninā vijñānasthitiṣu dagdhāsu na vijñānabījaṃ prarohati |
SA16n1276:5353: arhatastveṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ vaikalyānnāyatyāṃ kāyo bhavati iti jñātavyaṃ kleśapratyayā kāyavedaneti |
SA16n1276:5356: ato jñāyate vigatakleśo nopapatiṃ vedayata iti |
SA16n1276:5364: bhavatoktaṃ yathā daśanaṃ paścātkrameṇa bhavati tathā kleśā apīti |
SA16n1276:5368: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati |
SA16n1276:5369: pratyakṣaṃ khalu loke'smin kleśajaḥ kāya iti |
SA16n1276:5372: ato jñāyate āyatyāṃ pañcaskandhā api kleśajā iti |
SA16n1276:5382: jñātavyamime sattvā avaśyaṃ pūrvābhyāsasañcitamaithunarāgādikleśā ityatasteṣūtpadyanta iti |
SA16n1276:5388: tebhyaḥ pāpebhyo dṛṣṭa eva badhabandhanādiduḥkhamanu bhavanti |
SA16n1276:5396: kleśavivṛddhyā durgatau patati sa eva pāpakāyamanubhūya kleśān punarvardhayati |
SA16n1276:5406: teṣāmeva mahatvato duḥsthāne janmānuvartate yathā sūkaraśvādayaḥ |
SA16n1276:5407: alpakeśatvataḥ susthāne jāyata iti yathā [kaścit] kleśatanutvāt dānaśīlādikarmācaran ṣaṭsu kāmadeveṣūtpadyate |
SA16n1276:5412: paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā kudeśabhūmau ratā durjanaiḥ saha kutsitamadhivasantīti sarvamāsaṅgādbhavati |
SA16n1276:5417: śalabhā ime na jānanti agnirduḥkhasparśa ityatastatra patanti |
SA16n1276:5422: yathā ca kaścit kāmāsaktyā viprakṛṣṭāṃ vidiśaṃ gacchan na pratinivartate |
SA16n1276:5424: yathā vṛkṣasya mūle'nunmūlite sa vṛkṣaḥ punaḥ prarohati |
SA16n1276:5427: yathāpi mūle'nupadrute dṛḍhe cchinno'pi vṛkṣaḥ punareva rohati |
SA16n1276:5428: evamapi tṛṣṇānuśaye'nuddhṛte nirvartayati duḥkhamidaṃ punaḥ punaḥ || iti |
SA16n1276:5430: svato'vidyāṃ vinā ko jñānī tat vyayaduḥkhaṃ kāmayamāno vedayeta |
SA16n1276:5442: yathā viṣasarpasampūrṇe gṛhaprakoṣṭhe'prajvalite ca dīpe sukhādhyavasānaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1276:5444: tathā sattvā api avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ loke'bhiramante |
SA16n1276:5456: bhavapratyayā jātiriti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ kāyasya mūlamiti |
SA16n1276:5476: catasro jātayaḥ-aṇḍajo jarāyujaḥ saṃsvedaja upapāduka iti |
SA16n1276:5480: ato jñāyate catvāro jātivibhāgāḥ kāmatṛṣṇādhīnā iti |
SA16n1276:5484: catasro vijñānasthitayaḥ-rūpopagaṃ vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhat rūpapratiṣṭhitaṃ rūpārambaṇaṃ nandyupasevanam |
SA16n1276:5524: kleśā vedanāniśritā ityataḥ pañca vedanā indriyāṇi bhavanti |
SA16n1276:5531: [te] sarve kleśānāṃ nirodhāya bhavanti jñānī taddhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān skandhānupāśrayate |
SA16n1276:5539: evaṃ kleśānāṃ kramaśo nirodhātkāyo'pi kramaśo nirudhyate |
SA16n1276:5543: draṣṭavyamavaśyaṃ rāgādipratyayamidānīmāyatyāñca glānyupāyāsān labhanta ityato'vaśyaṃ [teṣāṃ] prahāṇaṃ prārthayante |
SA16n1276:5551: bhagavānāha-tatra tatra sūtre nandirāgakṣayātsamyagvimuktiṃ labhata iti |
